And at the end of each month, they can easily repay the loan, using their monthly salaries. It is their school's bursar who is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf.
Frankline (who is pictured on the left) is the featured leader of this group of teachers. The 46-year-old is a native of Bo district, in southern Sierra Leone. Frankline is a husband and a father of eight children. He has been a school teacher for 29 years now. He has requested this loan in order to buy house building materials like iron corrugated sheets for the construction of a dwelling house for his family.

loans.use: to buy house building materials like iron corrugated sheets for the construction of a dwelling house for his family

loans.name: Divino Nino Group

texts.es:
La Asociación comunal Divino Niño está conformado por diez integrantes ocho mujeres y dos hombres. Madres y padres responsables con veinte hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarios de la zona norte del país. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadores, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos. y brindarles un poco de tiempo.  Lamentablemente no pudieron estudiar y se dedicaron a trabajar para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad lucha para poder cumplir con sus sueños como es brindarles estudios techo y estabilidad a sus hijos.
Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora es Alba y tiene por actividad económica una pulpería, es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, detergente, jabón, jugos, fósforos. Ella dedica a su negocio unas  12 horas diarias, en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio con la compra de comestibles para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. La asociación comunal Divino Niño agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Divino Niño Communal Bank is made up of 10 members, 8 women and 2 men, mothers and fathers of 20 dependent children among them. They're from the northern part of the country. These people describe themselves as hardworking and responsible with a desire for personal self-improvement. In their spare time they enjoy the company of their children and dedicate a little bit of time to them. Unfortunately they weren't able to continue their studies because they needed to work and help with the household expenses. Currently they are fighting hard to complete their dreams such as giving their children education, housing, and stability.

Thanks to her effort and desire to get ahead, Alba is the coordinator of the communal bank. She makes a living running a "pulpería." A "pulpería" is a small store that sells food items such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, soap, juice, and matches. She dedicates more than 12 hours a day to her business, which is located at her house.

The goal of the loan is to invest in working capital and stock her business by purchasing food products so she can earn a better income in the near future.

Divino Niño Communal Bank is grateful for the help that Kiva lenders give to low-income people and poor countries like Nicaragua so they have the means for a decent job.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock her grocery store with goods such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, soap, juice, and matches.

loans.name: La Cruz Group

texts.es:
La señora Herlinda esta unida de hecho. De edad 30 años. No tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar. Tiene 3 hijos y de ellos 2 estan estudiando. Se dedica a la tejeduría de Cortes y Wipiles típicos de la región. Inició este negocio aprendiendo con su madre y a la fecha lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de hilos para poder elaborar sus tejidos. Desea en el futuro contar con un gran capital de trabajo y desea tener empleados.

Las demás intgrantes del grupo se dedican a tejeduría y artesanias.

En la fotografía aparecen 14 personas, pero, solo a 10 de ellas se les concedió el préstamo, porque las otras no llenaron los requisitos.
texts.en:
Herlinda is 30 years old and has a partner.  She did not have the opportunity to go to school but now hast three children, two of whom are in school. Herlinda makes a living knitting typical regional products.  She started this business when she learned this trade from her mother.  She now has ten years experience.

Herlinda is organising a group and applying for a loan, which will be used to buy threads in order to produce her knitted products.  In the future Herlinda wants to to be able to count on having a lot of working capital, and wants to have employees.

The other members of the group make a living in knitting and making artisan products.

There are 14 people in the photograph but only ten are taking out a loan on this occasion, because the others did not meet the requirements.

loans.use: to buy threads.

loans.name: Estela Claribel

texts.es: La señora Estela, es una humilde mujer que labora como docente para una escuela, ha sido madre y padre a la vez ya que es soltera y sola ha luchado para mantener a sus hijos,  actualmente desea  invertir en su hogar, realizando un muro de retención debido a que su casa está ubicada muy  debajo del nivel normal de la calle y cuando llueve se inunda la vivienda provocando estragos, mojando la ropa y los pocos electrodomésticos adquiridos con muchos esfuerzos. Estela solicita este crédito con el fin de comprar una parte de los materiales, cuenta con arena y piedrines, pero aun le falta comprar cemento, bloques, hierro, esta mejora le permitirá  mayor comodidad y sobre todo seguridad para su familia.
texts.en: Estela is an unassuming woman who works as a teacher at a school. She has been at once a mother and a father figure, because she's single and has strived to support her children on her own. She currently wishes to invest in her home by building a retaining wall, since her house is located way below street level. When it rains, the house floods, which wreaks havoc, wets the clothing and damages the few appliances that she has acquired through hard work. Estela requests this loan so that she can purchase part of the construction supplies. She has sand and gravel, but she still needs to buy cement, bricks and iron. This improvement will allow her to provide more comfort, and especially safety for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks and iron.

loans.name: Ildefonso

texts.es: Ildefonso, es originario y habitante del municipio de Juigalpa tiene 46 años de  edad, es padre de tres hijos quienes estudian la escuela primaria y secundaria, su esposa trabaja como empleada domestica, mientras el labora como policía municipal, trabaja arduamente para sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar las condiciones de vida. El solicita el crédito para comprar láminas de zinc y perlines con lo que cambiara todo el techo de su vivienda, el cual está en malas condiciones, de esta manera sus hijos estarán bajo un hogar más seguro.
texts.en:
Ildefonso is a native of and lives in the municipality of Juigalpa. He is 46, the father of three children who study in primary and secondary school. His wife works as a homemaker, meanwhile he works as a municipal policeman. He works arduously in order to get his family ahead and improve living conditions. 

He is applying for the loan to buy zinc roofing and rafters, with which he will change the roof of his home, which is in bad condition. In this manner, his children will be in a more secure home.

loans.use: to buy zinc roofing and rafters.

loans.name: Doris Azucena

texts.es:
La señora Doris es una persona emprendedora, honesta y seria, es madre soltera y vive con su hijo, en el sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la compra y venta de semillas.
Doña Doris el  préstamo lo necesita para la compra de maní, con el préstamo espera que las ventas de su negocio aumenten al tener más mercancía que ofrecer a los clientes y cubrir las necesidades de los mismo  y con esto mejorar un poco su situación económica, espera que para esta temporada navideña sus ventas aumenten. 
Doña Doris espera que a un corto plazo su negocio siga creciendo y consolidándose para que se convierta en el más grande y reconocido de la región y seguir apoyando a su familia y a su  hijo.


Choluteca, Honduras  – Diciembre   del   2013
texts.en:
Doris is a hard-working, honest, and serious person. She is a single mother and lives with her son in southern Honduras. Her business is buying and selling seeds. Doris needs a loan to buy peanuts, with the loan she hopes that sales from her business increase upon having more merchandise to offer her customers and meet their needs, and in this way improve her economic situation a little. She hopes that her sales increase during the Christmas season.

Doris hopes that in the short term her business continues growing and consolidating thus converting in the largest and most recognized in the region and she can continue supporting her family and her son.

Choluteca, Honduras - December 2013

loans.use: to buy peanuts for her business.

loans.name: Duo Orquideas De Sumpango Group

texts.es:
Dúo Orquídeas de Sumpango
Este dúo esta conformado por Tomasa, se dedica a la preparación de refacciones la cual lo vende en el mercado central de Sumpango Sac, de donde es originaria, ella necesita de un crédito mas para poder ampliar su negocio ya que la competencia incrementa por lo cual ellas necesitan tener mas variedad en venta de refacciones por esa razon esta solicitando un credito mas con kiva, es la cuarta ocasión que solicitan un crédito y prometen pagar puntualmente en cada pago asi como en los creditos anteriores.
texts.en: The communal bank "Dúo Orquídeas de Sumpango" includes Tomasa, who has a business preparing snacks which she sells in the central market of Sumpango, in Sacatepequez.  She is a native of this area.  She needs a loan to expand her business, because the competition is increasing, and so she needs to have a greater variety of snacks to sell.  This is why she is requesting another loan with Kiva.  This is the fourth time she has requested a loan, and she promises to make her payments on time as she did with her previous loans.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make and sell snacks

loans.name: Rubidia

texts.es:
Rubidia, se dispone a surtir el inventario de su negocio y necesita capital con el comprara golosinas, bebidas, granos básicos, entre otros productos que son demandados por sus clientes.
Con crédito anterior ella incremento la mercadería de su negocio, lo que le permitió aumentar sus ventas y recibir ingresos extras para salir a delante con sus compromisos.
texts.en: Rubidia is preparing to stock her business and needs capital to buy candy, beverages, basic grains and other products that her customers demand. With the previous loan she increased the merchandise in her business, which permitted her to increase her sales and receive extra income to be successful with her obligations.

loans.use: to buy candy, beverages and basic grains.

loans.name: Lidia Esmeralda

texts.es:
Lidia de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta educación media (bachillerato), comenzó a estudiar en la universidad; pero luego tuvo que abandonar el estudio porque no contaba con los recursos suficientes para continuar. Ella no ha perdido la esperanza, de poder retomar los estudios cuando los pueda sostener. Está casada y su esposo se dedica a las actividades de albañilería, cuando sale algún trabajo de construcción, pero lo que más frecuente realiza son actividades agrícolas. Lidia tiene dos hijos: el mayor (7 años) está estudiando. Además de sus hijos, cuida a su sobrino que vive con ella.

Doña Lidia además de realizar oficios domésticos en su hogar, tiene crianza de gallinas indias, estas las vende posteriormente en época de buenos precios, también vende los huevos de estas a los vecinos.
En las actividades agrícolas también le ayuda a su esposo, él cultiva maíz, frijol y maicillo.

 El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar cemento, arena y madera para mejorar su vivienda, ya que ella y su esposo están  construyéndola poco a poco, por no contar con los recursos económicos suficientes. Con las mejoras, podrán tener las condiciones de una vivienda digna, donde vivir con sus hijos.

Sus sueños son: además, de terminar de construir su casa, es el de poder retomar sus estudios universitarios, con el apoyo de su esposo y con la inversión en iniciativas productivas, para ello está aprovechando unas capacitaciones que recibe sobre panadería.  Esto le  permitirá costearse sus estudios sin descuidar el hogar.
texts.en:
34-year-old Lidia studied up until the end of high school and she began to study at university; however, she later had to abandon her studies because she did not have sufficient resources to continue. She has not lost hope of being able to retake her studies when she can afford them. She is married and her husband makes a living from bricklaying when construction work is underway, but otherwise he makes a living from farm work. Lidia has two children: the oldest (7 years old) is at school. Besides her children, she also looks after her nephew, who lives with her.

Apart from doing the household work, Lidia breeds hens, which she later sells when the prices are good. She also sells their eggs to neighbours.
She also helps her husband with the farm work; they grow corn, beans, and sorghum.

The loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo is for purchasing cement, sand, and wood for making improvements to her home, since her and her husband are building it a little at a time as they do not have sufficient economic resources. By making these improvements, they will be able to have decent living conditions for themselves and their children.

Her dream, besides finishing her house, is to be able to take up her studies at university again, with the support of her husband and by investing in productive initiatives. For this reason she is making the most of some training she is receiving on baking. This will allow her to fund her studies without neglecting her home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and wood in order to make improvements to her home

loans.name: Victor Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Víctor tiene 53 años de edad, está casado y es padre de 5 hijos, vive en una aldea de Esparta Atlántida, San Juan Pueblo con su esposa y tres hijos.
Hace 10 años que se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías en madera. El tiene su propio taller de artesanías en madera como ser tallados, lápices, lapiceros, carritos, fruteros, llaveros etc., también  elabora muebles artesanos para sala, comedor, divisiones y otros con madera y mimbre. Este negocio lo ha mantenido con los préstamos solicitados a ODEF, con los cuales ha podido hacer crecer el negocio y aumentar su clientela.
Actualmente solicita  otro préstamos  que es por  5,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar madera para elaborar un mueble de comedor como mesa y sillas que le han pedido. Su plan es seguir trabajando para hacer crecer el negocio y obtener mejores ganancias para un bienestar personal y familiar.
texts.en:
Víctor is 53 years old, married, and father of 5 children. He lives in the Esparta Atlántida village, San Juan Pueblo with his wife and three children. he has been making artisan pieces out of wood for 10 years. He has his own artisan workshop and makes carvings, pencils, pencil cases, carts, fruit bowls, keychains, etc. along with making furniture for the living and dining rooms, room dividers, and other items from wood and wicker.

He has maintained this business through loans from ODEF, which has helped him grow his business and increase his customers. Today he seeks a loan for 5,000 Lempiras, with which he will buy wood to make a dining room table and chairs that have been ordered.

His plan is to continue working to grow his business and obtain better income for his family's and his own well-being.

loans.use: to buy wood to make a dining room table and chairs and complete the order.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, es acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida, se dedica a sembrar granos básicos y a la crianza de cerdos, ya tiene muchos años de experiencia y no ha tenido problemas en realizar dicho negocio. 
Solicita un crédito para comprar concentrado, maicillo y cerdos, para alimentar  a los cerdos y luego venderlos. Espera fortalecer su negocio lo necesario para trabajar y continuar percibiéndolos ingresos que necesita para cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
Sueña con tener los recursos económicos para construir su casa de un material diferente para tener un techo más seguro.
texts.en:
Victor lives with his life partner.  He is a farmer who cultivates staple grains and also raises pigs.  He already has many years of experience in this line of work, and has not had problems with the business.

Victor is requesting a loan to buy animal feed, sorghum and pigs.  This way he can fatten the pigs and later sell them.  He hopes to fortify his business as needed so that he can work and continue to earn the income he needs to cover the expenses of his household.  

Victor dreams of having enough money to improve his house with better construction materials so that he could have a more secure roof.

loans.use: to buy animal feed, sorghum, and pigs

loans.name: Banco Comunal La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La Asociación comunal  La Esperanza está conformada por once mujeres madres solteras, con 20 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarias de la zona norte del país. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos. Se caracterizan por ser responsables, trabajadoras, con ganas  de superación personal. En la actualidad luchan día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora es  Bernabela  y tiene por actividad económica la crianza y venta de cerdos en pie. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación y por encargo. El objetivo del crédito es comprar un lote de cerdos que se lo ofrecen a buen precio, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. La asociación comunal La Esperanza agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
La Esperanza Communal Bank is made up of eleven women who are single mothers with a combined 10 children under their care. They are natives of the northern part of the country. In their spare time they enjoy the company of their children. They are known as responsible, hardworking and eager for self-improvement. Currently they fight every day to provide a better future for their children.

Thanks to her effort and her wish to get ahead, the coordinator is Bernabela. She  raises and sells hogs. Her business is conducted at her home and by order. The purpose of the loan is to purchase a herd of pigs that are being offered at a good price so that in the not too distant future she can increase her earnings. 

La Esperanza Communal Bank is grateful for the help that Kiva lenders are providing to people of scarce resources in poor countries like Nicaragua, so they will have a decent way of making a living.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock her business buying and selling hogs.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Luchadoras es un grupo que está en su 4º ciclo  del programa de comité, donde todas están realizando constantes capacitaciones para seguir unidas y crecer juntas. Las integrantes forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, donde están haciendo la encuesta para poder crecer y salir adelante por medio del esfuerzo  de todas.
Liduvina se destaca por el esfuerzo que hace, y comenta que tiene su tallercito de costura, donde hace todo tipo de trabajos en su máquina de coser, y por medio de su trabajo da a su familia lo que necesitan para que no tengan que pasar por ningún tipo de necesidades como las que ella tuvo que pasar.
Hoy pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cierres y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir haciendo sus trabajos y ayudar así a su familia.
texts.en:
Mujeres Luchadoras is a group that is on its 4th cycle in the committee program, where all members are constantly building their capacities to continue forward united and grow together. The members are part of a program to eliminate poverty, where they are doing a survey to be able to grown and be successful through the efforts of every member.

Liduvina stands out for the efforts she makes, and comments that her sewing shop, where she makes all kinds of items with her sewing machine, and through her work, gives her family all they need so that they don't have to lack the things she has had to lack. Today she seeks a loan to be able to invest in buying fabrics, thread, buttons, zippers, and other items and in this way be able to continue making her products and in this way help her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, zippers, and other items.

loans.name: Hilda Sofia

texts.es: Hilda Sofía, habita en una zona marginal de Managua, en donde sus pobladores son de muy escasos recursos. Es madre de tres hijos, dos de ellos estudiantes de primaria y uno pequeño. Se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa en su casa de habitación, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, con quien comparte los gastos. Hilda Sofía ha venido mejorando su hogar paulatinamente, logró levantar el muro frontal y ahora desea empezar a construir el lado norte de su vivienda para el cual solicita el apoyo de crédito para poder realizar esta obra tan importante para el bienestar de sus hijos, lo que le garantizará la seguridad en su hogar.
texts.en:
Hilda Sofía lives in a marginal area of Managua where the people are of scarce resources.  She is the mother of three children, two of whom attend elementary school and one who is very young.  She sells cosmetics and clothing from her home.  Her husband helps her and they share the expenses.

Hilda Sofía has been gradually making improvements to her home and was able to build a wall in the front and now she wants to start building on the north side.  She needs a loan so she can do this important work for her children’s wellbeing and to guarantee their safety in her home.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Dúo Estoy Con Dios Group

texts.es:
DUO ESTOY CON DIOS
Don Alfredo es originario del municipio de Tecpán, tiene 48 años de edad bajo su responsabilidad están sus hijos menores de edad él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años.
Don Alfredo es una persona trabajadora desde hace varios años el se dedica a la siembra de tomate, ejotes maíz, frijol, gracias a dios poco a poco a podido salir adelante, gracias también al apoyo de toda su familia ya que siempre lo están apoyando.
El sueño de él es construir su propio invernadero para mejorar la calidad de sus productos ya que así podrá tener mejores cosecha y mejores ganancias asi podrá mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de semillas y abono para su cultivo
texts.en:
DUO ESTOY CON DIOS

Don Alfredo is originally from the Tecpán municipality. He is 48 years old and has two minor-aged children in his responsibility. He has been farming for several years. Alfredo is a hard-working person who for several years has been growing tomatoes, corn, beans; thanks to God he has been able to little-by-little be successful, thanks also to the support of his family as they have always supported him.

His dream is to construct his own greenhouse in order to improve the quality of his products and in this way be able to have better harvests and increased earnings, thus be able to send his children to school so that they may have a better future. He seeks this loan to buy seeks and manure for his crops.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for farming.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
El señora Alba de 45 años de edad es  madre soltera,  vive con sus  dos hijos y sus nietos en su casa de habitación, se dedica desde hace 18 años al negocio de venta de rosquillas, quesadillas y hojaldras, su venta la realiza  en los mercados de San Lorenzo.
Doña Alba su venta es de lunes a sábado, es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica desde hace mucho tiempo a esta actividad y gracias a esto ha logrado salir adelante con su familia.
Doña Alba está vez solicita el préstamo para compra de materiales como cemento, madera, arena, etc ya que desea realizarle una mejora a su vivienda y construir una pila y un baño, con el apoyo del préstamo pretende mejorar su calidad de vida. (La foto esta tomada en su lugar de trabajo, pero el prestamo es para su hogar)
Doña Alba está muy contenta de seguir trabajando con Prisma es su noveno préstamo que solicita, su sueño es tener su propia casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras- Diciembre 2013
texts.en:
Alba is a 45 year old single mother who lives in a house with her two children and her grandchildren. For 18 years her job has been the sale of donuts, cheesebread, and puff pastries and she does her selling in the markets of San Lorenzo. Alba sells Monday through Saturday and is a hard-working woman who has been doing this for quite some time. By doing this work she has managed to support herself and her family. 

Alba is requesting a loan to purchase construction materials such as cement, wood, sand, etc. to build a sink and a toilet. She aims to improve her quality of life and income through this loan. (This picture is taken at her place of work, however the loan is to improve her home)

Alba is very happy about continuing to work with Prisma and her dream is to own a home. 

This is the ninth loan that she has requested.
San Lorenzo, Honduras-December 2013.

loans.use: To purchase cement, wood, sand, etc for her home

loans.name: Carmen Juana

texts.es:
Carmen vive en la ciudad de y Ica y trabaja como empleada del hogar en una vivienda de su ciudad, con el fruto de su trabajo puede sacar adelante a sus 2 hijos, los cuales son lo más importante que tiene en la vida, es por ello que lucha cada día para poder dales una vida digna.

Carmen esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su hogar ya que actualmente no cuenta con ella y no tiene donde conservar sus alimentos, así mejorar su calidad de vida y seguirá luchando por hacer realidad su sueño de la casa propia
texts.en:
Carmen lives in Ica city and works as a domestic employee in a home in her city. With this work she can support her two children, who are the most important thing in her life and for whom she fights every day to give them a life with dignity.

Carmen is thankful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to the help they provide she will be able to buy a refrigerator for her home as today she doesn't have one and doesn't have a place to keep her food. This will improve her quality of life and she will continue fighting to make reality her dream of owning her own home.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan, está acompañado, vive junto a su compañera de vida, se dedica a vender cocos y hielo, desde hace 10 años, en un horario de 9:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m., con tanto tiempo de experiencia él puede tener su negocio activo además son productos de fácil comercialización debido al clima de la zona en la que reside.
Con el préstamo comprara cocos y un frízer para aumentar la venta de hielo, con lo que espera mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus ganancias y salir de la deuda.
Sueña con tener su propio chalet para atender mejor a sus clientes y poder seguir cubriendo los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
Juan has a life partner who he lives with. For 10 years he has earned a living selling coconuts and ice, working from 9am to 4pm. With so much experience he is able to keep his business going and his products are also easy to sell because of the climate in the area where he lives.

Juan will use the loan to buy coconuts and a freezer to increase his sales of ice, which he hopes will improve his sales, increase his profits and pay off his loan. He dreams of having his own stall to serve his customers better and of continuing to meet his household expenses.

loans.use: to buy coconuts and a freezer.

loans.name: Juan Evangelista

texts.es:
Juan, es casado, vive con su familia que está compuesta por su esposa y su hijo de 21 años, como todo buen jefe de familia es el proveedor de lo necesario en su hogar para tener los ingresos se dedica a sembrar granos básicos (maíz y frijol),  y hortalizas, son oficios que aprendió desde hace mucho.
Necesita capital para pagar mano de obra y fertilizantes, abono, pesticidas y plaguicidas, lo que le permitirá recolectar la cosecha de granos básicos y tener los insumos necesarios para cultivar las hortalizas libre de plagas, espera que su producción sea mayor, tener más ingresos y cumplir con los compromisos económicos.
Aspira a hacer reparaciones necesarias en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Juan is married and lives with his family, which is composed of his wife and his 21-year-old son. Like all good heads of household, he provides for his family. Juan makes a living growing basic grains like corn and beans as well as vegetables. 

This is work that he learned to do a long time ago. Juan needs capital in order to pay for labor, fertilizers, compost, pesticides, and insecticides that will allow him to reap his harvest of grains and have the necessary supplies to cultivate his vegetables free of plagues. He hopes that his production will grow so his earnings also grow. This will help him to keep up with his financial responsibilities. Juan aspires to do some necessary repairs to his home.

loans.use: to pay for labor as well as fertilizers, compost, pesticides, and insecticides.

loans.name: Norma Yaneth

texts.es:
Norma, desde hace tres años se dedica a elaborar hamacas, es un oficio que aprendió dentro de su familia, lo hace todos los días, ella vive junto a su familia integrada por  su compañero de vida y su hijo de un año de edad.
El capital que solicita lo utilizara para comprar hilo, pues es su materia prima para continuar trabajando y cumplir con los encargos de sus clientes, espera mejorar la calidad de su trabajo para que sus ganancias sean mejor y poder apoyar en los gastos de su familia.
Sueña con construir su casa propia y darle a su familia un estilo de vida diferente.
texts.en:
Norma has been making hammocks for 3 years.  She learned how to do this from her family.  She works making hammocks every day.  She lives with her family, which consists of her life partner and her one year-old child.

Norma is requesting a loan to buy yarn, as this is the raw material she needs to continue working and filling her customers' orders.  She hopes to improve the quality of her work so that her earnings will increase, enabling her to support the family's finances.  Norma dreams of building her own house and giving her family a different lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy yarn to make hammocks

loans.name: Elmer

texts.es:
Elmer, es una persona soltera que para cubrir sus gastos personales por iniciativa propia instalo una  tienda en su residencia en la que ofrece variedad de productos de primera necesidad, su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m., todos los días.
El crédito que está solicitando es para surtir el inventario y comprar golosinas, bebidas, azúcar, jabón, detergentes, etc., todo lo necesario para dar mejores opciones de compra a sus clientes, mejorar su economía y cancelar sus deudas.
Aspira a tener un negocio con mejor rentabilidad y nuevos clientes
texts.en:
Elmer is single, and on his own initiative he opened a store in his home to cover his personal expenses. The store offers a variety of basic needs products. He works from 6:00 AM to 4:00 PM every day.

The loan he seeks will be used to stock his inventory and buy candy, beverages, sugar, soap, detergents, etc., everything needed to give better choices to his customers, increase his income, and pay off his debts. He aspires to have a more profitable business and new customers.

loans.use: to buy candy, beverages, sugar, soap, detergents.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es:
Marta, solicita otro crédito para efectuar la compra de vitaminas, cremas, calcio, etc., para renovar su inventario y continuar trabajando para cubrir los compromisos económicos.
Martha invirtió el crédito anterior en un una variedad de medicamentos, que le dieron la pauta para aumentar sus ventas, atraer más clientes y mejoro su economía, cancelo sus deudas, su local tiene una mejor imagen.
texts.en: Marta is requesting another loan so that she can buy vitamins, creams, calcium, etc to stock up her inventory and pay some bills.  Martha used the previous loan to buy a variety of medicines, which enabled her to increase her sales, attract more customers, improve her finances, pay off her debts, and give her shop a better appearance.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, creams, calcium, etc.

loans.name: Coumba's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc villageois est créé le 22 Juillet 2009 à l'occasion de son inauguration. Ce groupement montre l’ambition collective des femmes à faire face aux difficultés de la vie par la solidarité et l’entre aide Elles  vivent  toutes dans le même village.  C’est dans cette lancé qu’elles viennent d’entamer leur neuvième cycle. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce et la transformation de produits agricoles. 

Madame Coumba  (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. C’est une femme très dynamique et participe de manière très active aux activités du groupement. Elle est  mariée  et mère de 02 enfants dont 01 fille et 01  garçon. Elle est vendeuse de légumes frais dans les différents marchés hebdomadaires de la zone. Activité qu’elle pratique depuis plus d’une décennie.

Son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter journalièrement des légumes frais par 01 à 02 Kg selon la variété pour la revente au détail.

 Les bénéfices, elle les utilisera pour assister son mari dans les charges familiales : scolarité et santé des enfants.
texts.en:
This group was created on July 22, 2009 at the inauguration of their "Banc Villageois." This group shows women's shared ambition to cope with life's challenges through solidarity and helping one another. They all live in the same village. It is in this spirit that they enter their 9th loan cycle. 

Their main business is small trade and processing agricultural products. Coumba (standing on the far right with her hand raised) is the featured borrower of the group. She is a very dynamic woman and a very active participant in the group's activities. She is married and has 2 children, 1 girl and 1 boy. She sells fresh vegetables in the various weekly markets in her area. She has been in this business for more than a decade.

With this new loan, she plans on buying fresh vegetables daily for retail sale, in quantities of 1 or 2 kilograms, depending on the type. She will use the profits to help her husband with family expenses: schooling and healthcare for their children.

loans.use: to buy fresh vegetables daily for resale (1 to 2 kg, depending on the type).

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo las triunfadoras está en el programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde podrán conocer la situación en la que cada una está y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Luisa quien  se dedica a la venta de ropas y sábanas en forma ambulante y también sobre pedido, en su última encuesta de eliminación ella se encontraba mejorando su situación de ingresos, y es por ello que está muy entusiasmada. Es una persona muy trabajadora y por sobre todo luchadora.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar variedades de sabanas, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas, ayudando a su familia por medio de los ingresos que obtiene.
texts.en:
The “Triunfadoras” group is in the elimination of poverty program where they are participating in the elimination of poverty survey to learn of each of their situations so they can work.

Luisa is one of the members who sells clothing and bed sheets on foot and to order.  In the last survey she was improving her income situation and so she is very enthusiastic.  She is a hardworking person and above all does not give up.

She is asking for this loan to be able to buy sheets and be able to continue with her sales and help her family with her income.

loans.use: to buy bedsheets.

loans.name: Ndeye Coumba's Group

texts.fr: Créer le 05 décembre 2007 ce groupe compte 28 femmes qui sont toutes du même quarter et entretiennent des liens de solidarité très développés, s’activent dans des activités génératrices de revenu plus particulièrement le petit commerce. Madame Ndèye Ami (debout à droite sur la photo en bleu), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est âgée de 30 ans, est mariée et mère de six enfants dont 01 fille et 05 garçons. Son activité s’inscrit dans la vente de produit alimentaires (riz, huile, condiments, bonbons. Son nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter du riz ; des bonbons ; de l'huile, des condiments( piment, poivre, ail, cube magie). Les bénéfices de cette activité lui permettront en plus d’apporter son soutien à son mari dans la gestion globale du ménage et mieux assister ses enfants dans leur scolarité.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 5, 2007. It consists of 28 women who are all from the same neighborhood and whose bond of solidarity runs very deep. They conduct income-generating activities, mainly small trade. 

Mrs. Ndèye Amy, age 30, (standing on the right and dressed in blue) is the featured borrower from this group. She is married with six children, one girl and five boys. She sells food products (rice, oil, condiments, candy, etc.). This new loan will help her to buy rice, candy, oil, condiments (peppers, garlic, 
Maggi bouillon cubes) to sell. 

The profits from this activity will allow her to help her husband with the overall management of the household and to better support her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy food items for resale.

loans.name: Trova

texts.en:
Trova is 25 years old and is married with one child. She earns her income through the sale of crops and through livestock. She earns a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). CKWs are trusted community members who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area, including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. 

On her land, Trova grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables, sweet potatoes and bananas. She also has cows, pigs and chickens. 

As a CKW, Trova will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (a smartphone, a solar charging set, and a weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of her village, helping them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money she will earn as a CKW, Trova will invest in new agricultural expansion, livestock and seeds to increase her production. Her biggest dream in life is to be a large scale producer of livestock and crop products

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and a weighing scale.

loans.name: Estefa

texts.es:
Estefa esta separada del esposo; vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos en la zona de Alto chijini de la ciudad de La Paz, 
 
Actualmente se dedica a la venta de juguetes, los cuales los comercializa en Santa cruz y Tarija, departamentos del interior del País; trabaja por mas de ocho horas viajando cada semana y reuniendo mercadería para surtir y no perder clientela, con esta actividad ella mantiene a toda su familia ya que esta separada del esposo. estefa solicita el crédito para comprar más juguetes y aporvechar las ventas de navidad, fin de año y Reyes (el día 6 de enero se celebra Reyes).

El sueño de Estefa es poder darles una buena educación a sus hijos y que sean profesionales y en un futuro con sus ahorros poner una tienda.
 
Es la cuarta vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y la primera vez en KIVA.
texts.en:
Estefa is separated and lives in a home of her own with her two children in the Alto Chijini area of La Paz.

She sells toys in Santa Cruz and Tarija, in the central part of the country, and works more than eight hours a day, travelling every week to replenish her stock so she doesn’t lose customers.  She supports her family this way, now that she’s separated.  Estefa is asking for a loan to buy toys and take advantage of the Christmas and end of year season, and the Three Wise Men (celebrated on January 6).

Estefa’s dream is to be able to provide her children with a good education so that they will become professionals.  In the future she wants to open a store.

This will be her fourth loan through IMPRO and her first through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: Luisa Marina

texts.es:
La señora Luisa Marina, es madre sotera de un hijo, a quién con mucho esfuerzo logra darle educación.

Ella labora como conserje en una institución privada, con sus ingresos mantiene su hogar. Ella es una señora trabajadora que lucha día a día para sacar a su familia adelante. Su objetivo es mejorar su humilde vivienda, poco a poco mediante a su capacidad económica, solicita el crédito con el objetivo de comprar materiales de construcción para construir un área de cocina e ir reacomodando su casita con más espacio, que le permitirá comodidad a su familia, gracias al apoyo de financiamiento.
texts.en: Luisa Marina is a single mother with one son and she manages to provide him with an education with great effort.  She works as a concierge at a private institution and supports her household with her income.  She is a hardworking woman who strives every day to get her family ahead.  Her objective is to improve her humble home little by little through her financial capacity.  She is asking for a loan to buy building materials to build a kitchen area and continue setting up her home with more space so that her family will be more comfortable, thanks to this loan.

loans.use: to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Freddy Antonio

texts.es: Freddy un joven de 23 años de edad trabajador, su actividad comercial es la venta de frutas y verduras negocio que tiene 3 años de tenerlo gracias al apoyo de su padre, el tiene su puesto en el mercado de la capital compra al por mayor y luego comercializa su producto, el credito lo solicita para comprar. verduras como cebollo, tomate, chiltoma, ayote, chayote etc. y frutas: papahaya, sandia, bananos, melon, etc. agradce el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic  le han brindado ya que con las ganancias adquiridad contribuye con los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en: Freddy is a 23-year-old worker. His business is selling fruits and vegetables, a business that he has had for 3 years thanks to the support of his father. He has his post in the market of the capital buying in bulk and later selling his product. The loan that he is requesting is to purchase vegetables like onion, tomato, pepper, pumpkin, pear squash etc. and fruits: papaya, watermelon, bananas, melon etc. He is grateful for the support that Kiva and Afodenic have provided him as with the income acquired, he contributes to the household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge está muy agradecido por el apoyo brindado los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a esta ayuda el podrá comprar un local en el mercado de su distrito y de esta manear tener un ingreso extra para poder sacar adelante a su familia, ya que actualmente trabaja como vigilante del mercado, así el podrá seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en: Jorge is very grateful for the support the KIVA lenders offer. Thanks to this help he will be able to purchase a stall at the local market and have an extra source of income to support his family. At present he works as a guard at the market. This way he will be able to continue fighting to make his greatest dream a reality: having his own house.

loans.use: to purchase a stall at the local market.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María, es casada, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, se esposo se dedica a la agricultura, ella para apoyar en los gastos de su hogar se dedica a vender ropa y lociones, lo hace de 6:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m.
Comprará lociones, camisas, blusas, faldas y pantalones, con lo que piensa aprovechar la temporada navideña, le permitirá aumentar las ventas y estabilizarse económicamente.
Anhela tener un negocio más amplio y tener los ingresos que necesita para salir adelante junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is married and lives with her husband and children. Her husband works in agriculture. In order to help support household expenses, she earns a living selling clothing and lotions, working from 6:00 am until 4:00 pm.

With this loan she will buy lotions, shirts, blouses, skirts and pants. With that she can take advantage of the Christmas season and increase sales and become economically stable.

She yearns to have a larger business and have the income that she needs to forge ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy lotions, shirts, blouses, skirts, and pants.

loans.name: Cyrus

texts.en:
Cyrus lives close to Boyani, in Kwale county. Kwale county is located on the Kenyan coast, and borders Tanzania to the south. Inconsistent rainfalls make farming difficult, and contribute to the area's high poverty rates. Despite the unreliable rainfall, bees in the region have two excellent sources of food, the wild mangrove forest and local passion fruit plantations. Honey Care has offered farmers in the area a chance to purchase year-old beehives that have been repaired and re-waxed, and many individuals opted to buy these cheaper hives instead of new ones.

Cyrus is married and has five children. His wife works as a teacher, while Cyrus engages in projects on their land. Cyrus has been farming for sixteen years and is currently tending to a tree plantation. Cyrus is looking forward to becoming a beekeeper, as it will give him a source of honey for domestic use. 

This is Cyrus' first loan with Honey Care, and he plans to use the income generated by his beehives to pay for his children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy apiary materials and refurbished beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Billy

texts.en:
Billy lives in a small town in Kwale county. Kwale county is located on the Kenyan coast near the border of Tanzania. While beekeeping has not historically been a major activity in the region, the mangrove swamps closer to the coast and large passion fruit farms inland provide bees with robust sources of nectar. Honey Care has offered farmers in the area a chance to purchase year-old beehives that have been repaired and re-waxed, and many individuals opted to buy these cheaper hives instead of new ones.

Billy is married, and has one child. His wife works as a hotelier, while Billy runs a business driving a tour van. In their spare time, he and his wife farm their land, where they are currently growing fruit, maize, and a tree plantation. 

This is Billy’s first loan with Kiva, and he plans to use the income from his hives to help repair his tour van. In the future, Billy hopes to save up enough to replace his increasingly unreliable tour van with a new one.

loans.use: to buy apiary materials and refurbished beehives for honey production.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David lives in a small town in Kwale county. Kwale county is located on the Kenyan coast, and borders Tanzania to the south. Inconsistent rainfalls make farming difficult, and contribute to the area's high poverty rates. Despite the unreliable rainfall, bees in the region have two excellent sources of food, from a wild mangrove forest and local passion fruit plantations. Honey Care has offered farmers in the area a chance to purchase year-old beehives that have been repaired and re-waxed, and many individuals opted to buy these cheaper hives instead of new ones.

David is married, and has one child. His wife works as a greengrocer, while David works as a craftsman. He and his wife are growing trees on their land, and they are happy to have started beekeeping, as their bees will benefit their young saplings through pollination. They are also looking forward to having honey available for domestic use. 

This is David’s first loan with Kiva, and he plans to use the income generated by his hives to buy electrical tools to help him in his business.

loans.use: to buy apiary materials and refurbished beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali lives and works in a small town in Kwale county. Kwale county is located on the Kenyan coast, and borders Tanzania to the south. Inconsistent rainfalls make farming difficult, and contribute to the area's high poverty rates. Despite the unreliable rainfall, bees in the region have two excellent sources of food, from wild mangrove forest and local passion fruit plantations. Honey Care has offered farmers in the area a chance to purchase year-old beehives that have been repaired and re-waxed, and many individuals opted to buy these cheaper hives instead of new ones. 

Ali is married, and has seven children. His wife works as a shopkeeper, while Ali works jobs in town. Their land is dominated by mangrove forest, an interesting ecosystem in which relatively low-lying trees thrive on brackish water close to the tidal lines. Hives in this area can produce impressive amounts of honey that is usually dark and tangy in taste. 

This is Ali’s first loan with Kiva, and he plans to use the income generated by his hives to start a poultry project.

loans.use: to buy apiary materials and refurbished beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Madres Laboriosas Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Madres Laboriosas” conformada por 10 socios responsables, ya que no han tenido problema con sus pagos. Mirtha de 58 años es separada con 03 hijos, actualmente apoya a 02 de ellos. Mirtha se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, como actividad segundaria brinda servicio de cocina obteniendo un ingreso extra para su hogar.  Ella se siente feliz pues gracias a su esfuerzo sigue mejorando cada día. El crédito que solicitó lo destinó para la compra de cremas, perfumes, talcos y así tener que ofrecer a sus clientes. El deseo de Mirtha es de ver a sus hijos realizados profesionalmente. La Alcancía Comunal “Madres Laboriosas” agradece el apoyo brindado. Mirtha se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado derecho y vistes blusa color blanco.
texts.en:
This is the “Madres Laboriosas” group, made up of 10 responsible members who have not had any problems making their payments. 

Mirtha is 58 years old, separated, and has 3 children, two of whom she is currently supporting. Mirtha sells beauty products, and as a secondary occupation, she provides kitchen services, earning extra income for her home.  She feels happy, because thanks to her efforts, she continues improving every day.  

The loan she requested is earmarked for the purchase of creams, perfumes, powders and such that she must offer to her customers. Mirtha´s desire is to see her children become fulfilled professionally.  

The communal bank, “Madres Laboriosas” is grateful for the support they have been given. Mirtha is seen seated first from the right, wearing a white blouse.

loans.use: to purchase creams, perfumes and powders.

loans.name: Dúo Florecitas De Tecpan Group

texts.es:
DUO FLORECITAS DE TECPAN
Doña Alicia es originaria de Tecpan, tiene 39 años de edad y bajo su responsabilidad están  sus 4 hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y a la venta de leñas.
Desde hace varios años ella ha empezado con la venta de tortillas, gracias a Dios y gracias al apoyo de su esposo ella sigue adelante con su negocio ya que con el esfuerzo de todos sigue adelante con su negocio.
El sueño de ella es ampliar mas su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias y mandar a sus hijos  a  la   escuela  para un futuro mejor, ya que ella se dio cuenta que hoy en dia es muy importante la educación en los niños para tener un trabajo mejor, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz para elaborar tortillas, y compra de leña para la venta.
texts.en:
Alicia is originally from Tecpan. She is 39 years old and she has four small children in her care. She sells tortillas and firewood for a living. Several years ago she started selling tortillas. Thanks to God and the support of her husband she moved forward with her business so that with all her strength she is pursuing her business.
Her dream is to expand her business to obtain better income and send her children to school for a better future. She realizes that today education is very important for her children to have a better job. She is requesting this loan to buy corn to make tortillas and to purchase firewood to sell.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas and to purchase firewood for sale.

loans.name: Mayela Melissa

texts.es: La señora Mayela, casada madre de dos niños en edades escolares,labora para una empresa privada, su esposo es comerciante posee una agencia de refrescos, desde hace varios años han luchado por terminar de construir su vivienda pero se les ha hecho un poco imposible por las diferentes situciones que han vivido, enfermedades de los niños, el credito lo solita para la compra de materiales, cemento, zinc, arena. para realizar reparaciones y modificaciones, Agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le han brindado.
texts.en:
Mayela is married with two young children. She works for a private company. Her husband is a businessman who owns a drink company. For many years they have struggled to finish building their home, which has been made a little impossible for different situations they have lived with, such as sicknesses of their children.

The loan she is requesting is for purchasing materials, cement, metal roofing, and sand to carry out repairs and modifications. She is thankful for the support that Kiva and AFODENIC have provided.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es: Jose está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar una computadora ya que con esta mejora podrá realizar trabajos en programa autocad, ya que el trabaja como operario de construcción y esto le ayudara mucho en su empleo, así el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” estudiar la carrera de ingeniería civil”.
texts.en: Jose is very grateful to Kiva lenders because their help will enable him to buy a computer. This improvement will allow him to draft projects on AutoCAD. Since he works in construction, this will help him a lot in his work. This way he will be able to improve his income and keep fighting for his great dream, which is to earn a degree in Civil Engineering.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Inmaculada Concepcion Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Inmaculada Concepcion está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, se pusieron como objetivo el poder ayudarse las unas a las otras. Todas son madres, que luchan por el bienestar de sus familias y sus hijos, ya que quieren darles todo lo que no pudieron tener.
Marlen es parte de este grupo, quien comenta que con mucho sacrificio pudo montar para su pequeña peluquería, y hoy este negocio la ayuda a poder mantener a su familia. Ella sueña con poder seguir trabajando y así agrandar su salón para poder dar trabajo a otras personas que necesiten.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de tintes, shampoo, enjuagues, y demás insumos para poder seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes, y así poco a poco estar cumpliendo su meta.
texts.en:
The Immaculate Conception Group is in its second cycle of the Women's Committee Program, in which all members work and support each other in order to achieve progress. Each woman set a goal to be able to help her fellow members. All of the members are mothers, who strive for the well-being of their families and children, and to provide for them what they themselves could never have. 

Marien is a member of the Immaculate Conception group, and says that through a great deal of sacrifice, she was able to open her own hair salon. The business now helps Marien support her family. She aspires to keep working, expand her salon, and hire people who need jobs. 

Marien is applying for this loan so that she can purchase dyes, shampoos, conditioners, and other supplies. This additional inventory will allow her to keep providing high-quality service to her clients and gradually achieve her goals.

loans.use: to purchase dyes, shampoos, conditioners, and other supplies.

loans.name: Señor De Huanca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Guillermina ella es casada y tiene 60 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,leche y aceite, la socia tiene un puesto en el mercado que es una tienda de abarrotes, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 1 año en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.

La socia que esta tapada con un circulo su rostro ya no pertenece al banco comunal Señor de Huanca
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de tejidos, negocio de venta de alfombras, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de llantas.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank Señor de Huanca. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to Cusco province, in the  department of Cusco.

Guillermina is one of its members. She is married and has three children. She is sixty years old. Her business is a grocery store, where she sells basic items like rice, sugar, milk, and oil. She sets up a grocery stand in the market and works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. She has been in business for one year and it is going very well for her. She is requesting this loan to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice.

The member whose face is covered with a circle no longer belongs to the communal bank Señor de Huanca.
 
The other members are in business selling fabric, selling rugs, running a grocery store, and selling tires.

Guillermina wants to thank everyone who is a part of this dream by making these resources available. She promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es: Joel está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una cocina a gas ya que actualmente no cuenta con ella y solo cocina sus alimentos en una cocina a kerosene, de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y poder seguir luchando por sacar adelante a sus 2 pequeños hijos.
texts.en: Joel is thankful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they are offering him he will be able to buy a gas stove. He currently doesn't have one and can only cook his meals on a kerosene cooker. This will allow him to improve his quality of life and keep striving to provide for his two young children.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove.

loans.name: Hector De Jesus

texts.es:
Héctor, es un agricultor que cultivar maíz para venderlo en grano y elote, tiene 10 años de realizarlo, trabaja de 6:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m., es un oficio que aprendió de su familia, vive con su compañera de vida, su hijo de dos años de edad y sus padres. 
Invertirá en la compra de abono, plaguicidas, insecticidas, son los insumos necesarios para preparar el terreno para sembrar maíz, le ayudara a cuidar de la cosecha de plagas, aumentara su producción y mejor su economía.
Aspira tener mayores utilidades para continuar teniendo un negocio activo, con el que podrá obtener los ingresos para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Héctor is a farmer that grows corn to sell in grain and corn. He has been doing this for 10 years. He works from 6:00 AM to 1:00 PM. He is in the trade that he learned from his family. He lives with his life partner, his 2 year-old son, and his parents.
He will invest in the purchase of fertilizer, pesticides and insecticides. They are the necessary inputs to prepare the land to plant corn. It will help him to take care of crop pests, increase production and improve his income.
He hopes to have higher profits to continue having an active business, with that he will be able to obtain income to get by with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and insecticides.

loans.name: Marco Tulio

texts.es: Marco, tiene 29 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene 3 hijos y reside en el municipio de Esparta, Atlántida. Marco inicio con la venta de mercadería como ropa y hace 6 meses decidió dedicarse a revelar fotos, también enmarcar, ampliar fotos y crear videos. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa y lo ha mantenido mediante la inversión de varios prestamos. Actualmente solicita el cuarto ciclo que es por 10,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de marcos, papel para fotografías y tintas, para revelar, enmarcar y ampliar fotos. Su propósito es aumentar el negocio y mantenerlo estabilizado y obtener las ganancias necesarias para su familia.
texts.en:
Marco, age 29, and his wife are in a common-law marriage.  They have three children, and they live in the Esparta municipality in Atlántida.  Marco started out selling merchandise like clothes.  Six months ago he decided to develop photos.  He also frames and enlarges photos and creates videos.  He has this business at his house, and he has maintained it through the investment of various loans.

He is currently requesting his fourth cycle for 10,000 lempiras.  He will use the loan to buy frames, photography paper, and ink in order to develop, frame, and enlarge photos.  His intention is to expand the business, to keep it stabilized, and to get the income needed for his family.

loans.use: to buy frames, photography paper, and ink in order to develop, frame, and enlarge photos.

loans.name: Deysi Aydee

texts.es:
Deysi, vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 8 y 10 años, tiene una venta de verduras y frutas que nace a raíz de la necesidad de más ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares, vende sus productos de 8:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., ya tiene un año de tener su negocio.
Invertirá en la compra de güisquiles, jilotes, guineos, zapotes, ejotes, entre otra clase de frutas y verduras que le fortalezcan su negocio, espera tener un rentabilidad mayor con la cual cancelara sus deudas y aportara para que su familia salga adelante.
Sueña con ampliar su negocio para tener mejores utilidades.
texts.en:
Deysi lives with her life partner and her two children who are 8 and 10 years old. She sells vegetables and fruits, a business that came about due to the need to increase income to cover household expenses. She sells her products from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm. It has already been one year since she started her business.

With this loan she will invest in purchasing chayotes, green maize, bananas, sapote fruit, and green beans, among other types of fruits and vegetables that make up her business. She hopes to have greater profitability with which she can pay off her debts and provide so that her family can forge ahead.

She dreams of growing her business in order to increase profits.

loans.use: to buy chayotes, green maize, bananas, sapote fruit, green beans.

loans.name: El Futuro Del Mañana Group

texts.es: Jesús de 40 años de edad es soltero y no tiene hijos, actualmente es socio del grupo “El Futuro Del Mañana” conformada por 10 socios trabajadores que han ido mejorando en el transcurso del tiempo y pasan a su 7mo ciclo. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación Jesús ha llegado a cumplir unos de sus sueños, el de tener su negocio propio, la cual cuenta con una pollería hace 04 años. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para invertir en su negocio, pues comprará pollos. Su mayor deseo es de abrir otra pollería. El grupo “El Futuro Del Mañana” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada. Jesús se encuentra sentado, viste polo rojo y chaleco azul. En la parte superior al lado izquierdo se encuentra Paul ya que no pudo llegar a tiempo por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Jesús is forty years old. He is single and doesn't have any children. He currently belongs to the group El Futuro del Mañana, which comprises ten hardworking members who have kept improving over time and are now in their seventh cycle.

With lots of effort and dedication, Jesús has been able to achieve one of his dreams, which was to have his own business. He has been running his poultry shop for four years. He is requesting this loan in order to invest in his business and will use it to buy chickens. His greatest desire is to open a second poultry store. 

The group El Futuro del Mañana is grateful to Kiva lenders for the help they are offering. Jesús is the seated man wearing a blue vest over a red polo shirt. Paul is in the upper left corner because he wasn't able to arrive on time due to work.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
19 integrantes tiene esta grupo de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, que se unieron para trabajar juntas y ayudarse las unas  las otras. Las integrantes del comité han formado un grupo muy unido, mediante el esfuerzo y la responsabilidad de todas.
La Sra. Alicia, por ejemplo, solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos varios para su despensa, como ser bebidas, comestibles, verduras, frutas, verduras y demás, para surtir y renovar su despensa, lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
Alicia es una persona que desde joven ha trabajo, es por eso que no teme a ningún desafío. Su sueño es poder seguir creciendo para poder ayudar a su familia como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
This group from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso has nineteen female members who united in order to work together and help each other. The members of this committee have created a very tight-knit group through everyone's effort and responsibility.

Alicia, for instance, is requesting this loan to by a variety of supplies for her store, like drinks and food items, such as vegetables, fruit, and other items. Increasing and renewing her stock will help her implement her business plan, which in turn will help her improve her income.

Alicia has been working ever since she was young, so she isn't afraid of challenges. Her dream is to continue growing in order to help her family as she always has.

loans.use: to stock up on drinks and food items like vegetables, fruit, and other items.

loans.name: Tania Carolina

texts.es: Tania está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su hogar, ya que actualmente no tiene donde guardar sus alimentos, de esta manera podrá ir mejorando su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en: Tania is very grateful for the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the help they have provided her, she will be able to purchase a refrigerator for her home. Today she does not have anything to save her food. In this way she will be able to improve her quality of life and continue struggling to be able to give a better life to her children.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio de venta de productos de belleza y de esta manera poder mejorar sus ventas y poder atender los pedidos de sus clientes, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su negocio y seguir luchando por sacar adelante a sus 2 hijos, a los cuales quiere muchísimo
texts.en: Hilda has a business selling beauty products and is very grateful to Kiva lenders, as their help will enable her to purchase more merchandise. This additional inventory will allow Hilda to fill her customers' orders and thus improve her business. By achieving these goals, Hilda will be able to keep striving to provide a better future for her two beloved children.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Dúo Inspiracion De Sacatepequez Group

texts.es: Dúo Inspiración de Sacatepequez, representado por Mirna de 26 años casada y tiene un hijo, su esposo es piloto de trasporte pesado rutas varias en Guatemala,doña Mirna quien se dedica a la venta de ropa típica, en el mercado Municipal de Santiago Sac, desde hace 3 años, doña Mirna empezó vendiendo ropa usada ahora tiene su puesto en el mercado y a agrandado el mismo, ahora tiene variedad de colores y estilos, está feliz y agradecida ya que ahora tiene un ingreso fijo para así ayudar a su familia,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa tipica para la venta.
texts.en:
Doña Mirna is 26, married with a son, and one half of the Inspiration of Sacatepuequez Paternship. Her husband drives a large truck on various routes through Guatemala. 

Doña Mirna sells traditional clothing at the Municipal Market in Santiago, Sacatepuequez. She began selling used clothing three years ago, but now has a stall at the market and has expanded her business. Doña Mirna sells a variety of colors and styles, and is pleased and grateful that she now has a steady income to help provide for her family. She is applying for this loan to purchase traditional clothing to sell.

loans.use: to purchase regional clothing for sale.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: Elvira está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva porque con el apoyo que le están brindando podrá comprar panetones, champagne, entre otros productos para poder ofrecer por campaña navideña en su pequeña bodega de abarrotes, con lo cual podrá mejorar sus venta y poder seguir creciendo y luchando por hacer realidad su gran sueño de tener un minimarket y poder brindarle a sus hijos un futuro mejor.
texts.en: Elvira is very grateful to Kiva lenders because the help they are offering will allow her to buy pastries and sparkling wine, among other items, to offer her customers during the Christmas season. This way she will be able to improve sales in her small grocery store and keep fighting for her big dream, which is to open a minimart and offer her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy pastries and sparkling wine, among other items.

loans.name: Jose Isidro

texts.es:
José, es empleado como vigilante, además se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, es acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 6 y 8 años de edad. Trabaja todos los días de 6:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m. ya cuenta con cinco años en su empleo y en el cultivo 15 años, para realizar el cultivo paga mozos, es un oficio que aprendió de su familia.
En está ocasión comprara cemento, ladrillo, arena y hierro, para realizar mejoras a su vivienda, lo que le permitirá dar a su familia un hogar mejor y seguro.
Anhela continuar realizando sus actividades económicas para dar a sus hijos una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
José is employed as a guard. He also cultivates corn and beans for a living. He is in a relationship and lives with his life companion and his two children who are 6 and 8 years old. He works every day from 6:00 AM to 3:00 PM and has 5 years in this position. He has farmed for 15 years. In order to cultivate, he pays porters. This is a trade that he learned from his family.
On this occasion he will buy cement, bricks, sand and iron to improve his home. This will allow him to give his family a better home and security.
He hopes to continue working in order to give his children a college education.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand and iron.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
Las integrantes han formado un grupo unido gracias al esfuerzo y trabajo continuo de todas las integrantes, todas son mujeres muy luchadoras que quieren dar a sus familias todo lo que necesitan. Están en su tercer ciclo del programa de comités, con muchas esperanzas de superarse.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Amada, quien pide este crédito para la compra de bebidas, comestibles, verduras, hortalizas y demás, para su pequeño almacén, lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
Ella es una persona que quiere salir adelante y poder ayudar a su familia, es por eso que siempre se esfuerza mucho.
texts.en:
These members have formed a group thanks to their continuous effort and hard work.  All are hardworking woman who want to provide their families with all they need.  They are in their third cycle of the committee and have great hope to succeed.

Amanda is one of them and is asking for a loan to buy beverages, food, vegetables, and other things for her small store.  This will help her solidify her business plan which will help her improve her income.

She is a person who wants to get ahead and help her family, so she is always working hard.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Santos Alberto

texts.es: El señor Santos tiene mas de 30 años de dedicarse a Cultivar la Tierra, habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposa e hijos quiene junto con el cultivan Piña. actualmete tiene cosechada Pitahaya y Piña las cuales requieren de mantenimiento, el credito lo solicita para la compra de Urea, Completo, Triple, etc. por lo que la piña esta en crecimineto y quiere evitar la propagacion de plaga e insectos. agradece el apoyo que se le ha brindado estos años.
texts.en: Santos has more than 30 years’ experience working the land and he lives in the town of Ticuantepe, along with his wife and children.  Together they raise pineapple and he currently has dragon fruit and pineapple crops, which need maintenance.  He is asking for this loan to buy urea, complete, triple, etc.  His pineapples are growing and he wants to prevent diseases and insects.  He is grateful for the support he has gotten all these years.

loans.use: to maintain his crops.

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es: Maritza tiene 42 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su nieta de dos años de edad. Maritza trabaja como empleada de una institución pública de su localidad. Trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia y colaborar con la economía del hogar. Desea hacer algunas mejoras en su vivienda ya que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminar algunos detalles. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena y pintura para repellar y pintar las paredes de la vivienda. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Maritza is 42 years old and lives in her own home with her two year old granddaughter. Maritza is an employee of a public institution in her town. She works very hard to get her family ahead and to help with household finances. She wants to make some home improvements and put the last finishing touches, but hasn't had the financial means to do so. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of materials like: cement, sand, and paint to plaster and paint the walls of her home. She states that she is capable of making the required loan payments.

loans.use: To purchase: cement, sand and paint to plaster and paint the home's walls

loans.name: Dúo Esfuérzate Y Se Valiente Group

texts.es:
Dúo Esfuérzate y Se Valiente
Dúo conformado por Marta Estela originaria del área de san Martín Jilotepeque, es muy trabajadora y luchadora. Marta Estela posee un puesto en el mercado donde ofrece a sus clientes zapatos plásticos, ginas, sandalias, lazos, hamacas. El sueño que ella tiene es poder ofrecer a sus clientes botes de metal de diferentes tamaños, ya que en esa area tienen mucha demanda y debido a la falta de dinero no ha podido comprar y por ello es que solicita el crédito,ella es bien responsable y además no tiene créditos en otras instituciones,es por eso que solicita un credito a Kiva para seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en: Marta Estela is one of Dúo Esfuérzate y Sé Valiente's two members. She is from the area of San Martín Jilotepeque. She is a very hard worker and a fighter. Marta Estela has a stand in the market where she sells her customers rubber shoes, sandals, ribbons, hammocks, and other items. She wants to be able to offer her customers metal containers in different sizes because these items are in high demand in her area and due to lacking money she hasn't been able to buy any. That is why she is requesting this loan. She is very responsible and doesn't have any debt with other entities. She is requesting a Kiva loan in order to keep her business growing.

loans.use: to buy metal containers to sell.

loans.name: Las Perlitas Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco pertenece al banco comunal LAS PERLITAS, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Valentina tiene 54 años de edad ,05 hijos y es viuda, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia vende lo que son zanahorias,lechuga,tomates entre otros, la socia trabaja de lunes a domingo durante el dia,la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de zanahorias al por mayor.

Los demás socios se dedican a la venta de verduras, venta de ropa, venta de cierres, venta de granos y docentes.

La socia se siente agradecida con los inversionistas de Kiva y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The members belong to the Las Perlitas (Little Pearls) Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member Valentina is 54 years old, a widow with five children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling vegetables at one of the markets in the city of Cusco. She sells carrots, lettuce, tomatoes and other vegetables, working Monday through Sunday during the day. She has worked at this type of business for years and it is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. She wants to be able to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.

She is requesting the loan to buy carrots wholesale. She feels grateful towards the Kiva investors and promises to fulfill her dues.

The other members work in vegetable sales, clothing sales, zipper sales, grain sales and teaching.

loans.use: to purchase carrots wholesale.

loans.name: Adilia

texts.es: Adilia, tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo y reside en el municipio de Esparta, Atlántida.
