Víctor has a family composed of his wife and their two children. Victor is the main pillar of their family. He generates income for his family by sowing basic crops like corn and beans. Victor learned this trade from his father when he was very young.

He will buy compost, fertilizer, pesticide, and insecticide to prepare his land for sowing and have a better crop. Victor hopes to see an abundant harvest, improve his sales and increase his earnings so that he can pay off the debt he is taking on. Victor dreams of giving his family better conditions regarding food and clothing.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer, pesticide, and insecticide.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: Don Teodoro es originario de la ciudad de Boaco. De oficio agricultor, se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijoles, trigo y al ordeño de ganado, que con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo ha logrado salir adelante. Esta agradecido con Kiva y MiCredito ya que obtuvo una buena huerta de las semillas que siembra y seguir manteniendo sus cosechas. Solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar dos terneros para crianza, con el fin de obtener más ganado. Estima que el crédito le ayudara incrementar la crianza de su ganado y la reproducción del mismo.
texts.en:
Teodoro was born in the city of Boaco. He makes a living as a farmer, sowing corn, beans, wheat, as well as milking cows. He works very hard and has been successful enough to keep moving forward. Teodoro is grateful for Kiva and MiCredito, which helped him achieve good results in his garden from the seeds he sows. His previous loan helped him to maintain his crops. 

Teodoro is requesting a new loan in order to buy two calves to raise so that he has more cattle. He hopes that this loan will help him to raise more cattle as well as help them reproduce.

loans.use: to buy two calves to raise.

loans.name: Lungset Lom Group

texts.en:
Living her life as a refugee because of ethnic clashes since 1995, Hatneithem lives in a village which is about 45 kms from the main town of Imphal. The other group members also live in the same village. Hatneithem is the featured borrower member for the Lungset Group and she is pictured with her hand raised. Starting a new life after the ethnic clashes was not easy; financial insecurity paralysed their life. Her husband and she have geared up together to start a new beginning and work very hard, encouraging one another.

Hatneithem is a weaver. She weaves different designs of woven clothes for both women and men. At the beginning, she used to ask the customers to bring their own yarn/thread for weaving, and she usually gets paid for the labour charge only. She did not have the option to purchase yarns and thread for the customers as she did not have financial resources. After she joined the Lungset group, Hatneithem was able to purchase her choice of yarn and thread and makes more profit than before. The generated income is meager and is insufficient to manage the family expenses. 

With the Kiva loan, Hatneithem will purchase yarn and thread to stock and start weaving. With sufficient supply of yarns and thread, one can manage to weave, making woven clothes for both men and women, which is a very good source to generate income. Hatneithem is glad that, with the help of the loan, she will be able to continue the weaving business and also manage the family financial expenses with the generated income. Her only wish is to give good education to her kids so they will be able to stand on their own feet and become successful academically.

Hatneithem says “Thank you, Kiva!” The support and unending co-operation is hoped for and the group will also abide and practice the good message that Kiva is doing. The rest of the group members are engaged in piggery, cattle rearing, weaving and petty businesses.

loans.use: To purchase and stock yarn and thread for weaving

loans.name: Bertha Julia

texts.es: Doña Bertha, es madre soltera de tres hijos el mayor  de ellos trabaja, Bertha mantiene a los dos pequeños que aun dependen de ella, paga sus gastos gracias al alquiler de 4 cuartos que tiene en su casa de habitación, por medio de estos ingresos mantiene la colegiatura de sus hijos. Solicita este crédito para comprar materiales para la instalación de inodoro y baño dentro de uno de los cuartos que tiene para alquiler el cual ahorita esta vacio y desea aprovechar el momento para realizar la obra, esta inversión le garantizara un mejor servicio a sus clientes y mejorando las condiciones de la habitación.
texts.en:
Bertha is a single mother with three children.The oldest one is employed. Bertha provides support for the two younger ones as they are still dependent on her. She manages the expenses by renting four rooms in her home. This income pays for school fees for the children.

She is asking for this loan to buy supplies for installing a toilet and bath inside of one of the rooms that she has for rent which is vacant right now as she wants to take advantage of the moment to take care of this. This investment will provide better amenities for her tenants by improving the living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a toilet, fixtures, pipes, blocks, cement, sand, and iron.

loans.name: Tamemsu 1 Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the "Tememsu I" group. They are small scale business people based in Waterloo, a small town in western Sierra Leone. They are requesting a loan of 800,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) per member in order to to enable them to further expand their respective businesses. Consequently, they will make more profit and improve their standard of living. 

Kadiatu, aged 30, is the featured leader of this group. She was in Massingbi village, in northern Sierra Leone. Kadiatu is married to a trader and the couple has three children who attend primary and secondary schools. For the past two years, Kadiatu has been selling gari (food made out of cassava roots), sugar, salt, etc. She will use her share of this loan to buy gari, sugar, salt, etc. in large quantities to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy gari, sugar, salt, etc. in large quantities to add to her current stock

loans.name: With Out Money Group

texts.en:
Hawa is the featured leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Hawa was born forty-eight years ago in one of the villages that make up Yoni chiefdom, in northern Sierra Leone. She is married to a cook and the couple have three children, one of whom is attending school. Hawa sells fish and has been selling fish for eight years now. 

With the help of this loan, Hawa and her group members will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Hawa will use her share of the loan (800,000 Sierra Leonean Leones) to buy a large quantity of fish to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of fish to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Blessings Group

texts.en:
Zainab, 27 years old, is the featured leader of this group of entrepreneurs. She was born in Mambolo, in northern Sierra Leone. Zainab is married to a school teacher and the couple has five children, four of whom are attending primary and secondary schools. For the past four years, Zainab has been selling clothes, dishes, etc. She will use her share of the loan (900,000 SLL) to expand her business, buying clothes and dishes in bulk to add to her current stock.

Together, members of this group are requesting a loan of 3,600,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy clothes and dishes in bulk to add to her current stock

loans.name: Money For Pay Group

texts.en:
Fatmata, 47 years old, is the featured leader of this group of entrepreneurs. She was born in Freetown, Sierra Leone’s capital city. Fatmata is married to a driver and the couple has four children who are attending primary and secondary schools. Fatmata has been selling market food: onions, rice, fish, pepper, salt, margi (a sweet flavoring), etc. Fatmata will use her share of this loan (800,000 SLL) to buy these items wholesale to add to her current stock. 

With the help of this loan, Fatmata and her group members will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy onions, rice, fish, pepper, salt, margi, etc. wholesale to add to her stock

loans.name: Cole Town Traders Group

texts.en:
Adama is the featured leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Adama was born in one of the villages that make up Sanda, 42 years ago. She is married and has four children, three of whom are attending primary and secondary schools.

For many years now, Adama has been selling fish. With the help of this loan, Adama and her group members will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions.

Adama will use her share of the loan (800,000 Sierra Leonean Leones) to expand her business by buying a large quantity of fish to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of fish to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Yesenia Yaneth

texts.es:
Yesenia, tiene la necesidad de invertir en el negocio de venta de huevos, y el capital lo utilizara para comprar huevos por mayor y luego distribuirlos entre sus clientes, a que sus demandas son mayores.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció el negocio, sus clientes aumentaron, las ventas son mayores y su economía es más estable, ella y su familia se encuentra bien de salud,
texts.en:
Yesenia needs to invest in the egg sales business, and she will use the capital to purchase eggs wholesale and then distribute them to her customers, from whom her orders are increasing. 

With the previous loan she strengthened her business and her customers increased.  Her sales are greater, her financial situation is more stable, and she and her family are in good health.

loans.use: to purchase eggs wholesale.

loans.name: Mirella Yvone

texts.es:
Mirella tiene 33 años, vive en la ciudad de chincha y con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado tener su negocio de venta de abarrotes, bebida y comida desde hace 7 años, con lo cual ha podido sacar adelante a su menor hijo.

Mirella esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que nos han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para la campaña navideña como panetones, champagne, entre otros; así ella podrá atender el pedido de sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Mirella is 33 years old. She lives in the city of Chincha. With much effort she has been able to open her own business selling groceries, soft drinks, and other food items for the last seven years. This business has helped her provide for her young son. 

Mirella is grateful for Kiva lenders because the support she has received from them allows her to buy merchandise for the Christmas season such as breads, champagne, and other items. This will help her to meet the demands of her clients and increase her income. In this way, she will continue fighting to maker her dream of owning her own house a reality.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Michel

texts.fr:
Monsieur Michel, est enseignant de profession où il a exercé pendant 11 ans. Il a arrêté et travaille maintenant pour son propre compte depuis 2010. Son activité consiste à la fabrication de filtre à eau, c’est d’ailleurs la raison de sa demande de crédit. Un crédit qui va lui permettre d’acheter le matériel nécessaire pour la confection des filtres à eau. Il travaille de 6h du matin à 23h du soir.
Michel est marié et père de 6 enfants dont le plus âgé est une fille de 13 ans. En dehors de la dépense quotidienne, il s’occupe aussi de la location, de l’électricité et de l’eau.
Michel veut acquérir un terrain dans un futur proche et aider ses enfants à réussir dans la vie.
texts.en:
Michel was a teacher for 11 years. But now he has his own business, which he started in 2010, where he makes water filters. It is for this reason that he is seeking a loan. A loan will allow him to buy the necessary materials to make his water filters. 

He works from 6 a.m. to 11 p.m.

Michel is married and a father of six children, of whom the eldest is a 13-year-old girl. In addition to the everyday expenses, he must also take care of the rent, electricity, and water.

Michel wants to acquire some land in the near future and help his children succeed in their lives.

loans.use: to buy buckets and the necessary materials for making water filters to resell

loans.name: Varuzhan

texts.en:
Varuzhan lives in the village of Khachardzan in Tavush region. He is married and he has five children: three sons and two daughters. His two sons and two daughters are already students and the smallest son is still primary school-aged. This big and nice family’s main income comes from farming; in his farm Varudzan has four calves, a cow and twenty chickens. His wife greatly helps him in farming. 

Varuzhan has a   small woodworking shop and he makes doors, windows, tables, chairs and boxes for beehives all to order. At the same time he works as a sentry at the school. So as a father of a big family, Varuzhan works day and night, in order to provide his large family with minimal living conditions.

Varuzhan is asking for a loan of 900,000 Armenian drams in order to buy several calves and animal fodder, so as to make his farm richer with hope of having more income from it.

loans.use: to buy several calves and animal fodder

loans.name: Ogsen

texts.en:
Ogsen is 28 years old and he lives in Stepanvan city in Lori region. He is not married; he lives with his retired mother. His father died several years ago. 

Ogsen worked as a contractual military serviceman, but now he works at a gas station as a locksmith. Ogsen also has two brothers, who are married and  live in the Russian Federation with their families. As Ogsen says, he and his mother greatly miss them and their children and to speak with them by phone is very expensive. 

Ogsen greatly wants to provide his mother with good living condition and comfort. He is asking for a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a washing machine for his mother and he also wants to buy a computer in order to be able to speak with his brothers’ families by Skype.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine for his mother and a computer in order to be able to speak with his brothers’ families by Skype

loans.name: Sergey

texts.en:
Sergey is 28 years old and he lives with his family in Stepanavan city in Lori region. Sergey is married and he has a small son. Since 2007 Sergey has served as a platoon commander. He is a very patriotic person and he teaches his soldiers to be devoted to their motherland and to their religion. He has received this rank thanks to his responsibility and love for his homeland. As Sergey says, the money that he earns is enough for their living, but his savings are too little for the surprise that he wants to make for his beloved wife.

He is asking for a loan of 250,000 Armenian drams, which together with his savings will be the amount which he needs in order to buy kitchen furniture and some electrical equipment for their house.

loans.use: to buy kitchen furniture and some electrical equipment for their house

loans.name: By God In Power Ii Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “By God In Power II” group. They are small-scale business people based in Waterloo, a small town in western Sierra Leone.

Together, they are requesting a loan of 5,000,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more profit and consequently improve their standard of living.

The featured leader of this group is Sia. Sia is age twenty-eight; she was born in Kono, eastern Sierra Leone, but she is currently residing in Waterloo, together with her husband and two children. Her husband is a motorbike taxi driver, and her children are attending primary and secondary schools. 

Sia sells milk, batteries and a wide variety of assorted goods. With this loan, she will buy milk, batteries, etc. in large quantity to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy milk, batteries, etc. in large quantity to add to her business

loans.name: Fish Women Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you members of the “Fish Women” group. These are small-scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to apply for a loan of 500,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) for each in order to invest in their respective businesses.

Kadiatu is the featured leader of this group. Kadiatu is a thirty-eight-year-old, she is married to a carpenter and they have five children, three of whom are attending primary school and two in secondary school.

Kadiatu sells fish and has been doing this business for many years now. With the help of this loan, she will invest in her business by buying a large quantity of fish to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of fish to add to her business.

loans.name: Lesbia Escorcia

texts.es: Doña, lesbia es una señora que como muchos nicaragüenses se dedica a la venta de ropa en su  hogar y también va a dejar encargos de casa en casa, es soltera, sola busca la manera de salir adelante con este pequeño negocio que es su único sustento de vida. Solicita el crédito con el objetivo de invertir en más ropa nueva y un cajón de juguetes aprovechando la temporada navideña, ya que estos se venden mucho, agradece mucho la facilidad de crédito con lo que invierte en su negocio pagando en cuotas pequeñas, de esta manera es que ella puede  hacer crecer poco a poco sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Like many Nicaraguans, Lesbia sells clothes at her house.  She also delivers orders door to door.  She is single, and she is only looking for the way to get ahead with this small business.  It is her only life support.

She is requesting the loan to buy more new clothes and a case of toys.  She will be taking advantage of the Christmas season because these items are sold a lot.  She is very grateful for the ease of the loan, which she will invest in her business in small payments.  This way she will be able to make her income grow little by little.

loans.use: to buy varied new clothing and a case of toys to sell.

loans.name: Miguel Àngel

texts.es:
Miguel de 31 años de edad,  es una persona que solo estudio hasta educación media y es casado; su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos.  Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa e hijos que van a la escuela,  quienes dependen de las actividades que él realiza.

Miguel  se dedica a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de sus padres,  para llegar a la parcelas camina 5 Km.  y trabaja durante toda la mañana, mientras  su esposa durante la mañana ordeña y se dedica a  vender la leche y luego en el transcurso de la tarde él cuida los animales en los potreros que alquila.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar dos vaca lecheras y producir mas leche para la venta.

 Miguel planea comprar un terreno, para tener sus animales, ya que alquila lo que le genera mas gastos y disminuye los ingresos para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Miguel, age 31, only has a middle school education.  He is married, and his wife devotes herself to the domestic chores.  He gets up at 4:00 a.m. together with his wife and children, who go to school.  They are dependent upon his business activities.

Miguel is a farmer, a trade he learned from his parents.  In order to get to his land, he walks five kilometers.  He works all morning while his wife milks the cows and sells the milk.  Then, in the afternoon he cares for the animals in the pastures that he rents.

The loan he is requesting is to buy two dairy cows in order to produce more milk to sell.

Migual plans to buy a piece of land for his animals.  He now rents, which generates more expenses and decreases the income for his family’s support.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows in order to produce more milk to sell.

loans.name: Yeprem

texts.en:
Yeprem is 55 years old and he lives in the city of Kapan in Syunik region. Yeprem studied at the Kapan Mountain College to become an electrician. For several years he worked as a construction electrician, then he worked at the school as a teacher of drawing. Now he again works as an electrician. 

Yeprem’s wife died two years ago. Since then, Yeprem has been responsible for the care of their four children. His two daughters are already students at the Yerevan State Medical University. His elder daughter lives with her aunt, who is alone, and she visits her father very often. Yeprem’s son is 28 years old and has a fiancee; they decided to get married and to organize a small, nice wedding party.

Yeprem is asking for a loan of 300,000 Armenian drams, which together with his savings will help him to cover the expenses of his son’s wedding party.

loans.use: to pay the expenses of his son’s wedding party

loans.name: Kim Group

texts.en:
Lhingneichong believes in endurance and patience. Sustaining a family with a meager source of income is undeniably difficult for everyone, but it is harder for Lhingneichong, whose work site is about 5 kms away from the village. She walks at the break of the dawn to collect charcoal and comes back the same 5 kms route to the village and boards a mini truck with the charcoal at the top of the mini truck to the town market to sell it. She is the featured borrower member for Lily Lom and she is pictured with her hand raised.

The group comprises five hardworking women who all reside in a village that is about 15 kms far from the town. The town is 62 kms from the capital town of Imphal. The group members usually contribute equal shares and take land from the village chief on rent for a period of one year so that they can cut down firewood and burn it for charcoal. When the charcoal is ready to be sold, she walks everyday at the break of the dawn to collect the charcoal from the burial sites and carries the charcoal sack on her back and walks back to the village. Only once or twice do vehicles ply that route. If one gets lucky, then one gets a ride or else walking is the only option. From the village, she travels to the town market with the charcoal and sells it.
	
With the KIva loan, she will contribute a share for taking the land on rent and start burning charcoal. She is sure to earn a good amount of money since charcoal is in great demand during winter season and the price also is high unlike in off seasons. She says she will also be able to pay new admissions for the children without worrying where to get the money as she could sell her charcoal like hot cakes in this season. 

Her dream is to purchase a used mini truck so that it can be used as a carrier for charcoal and also as a passenger carrier. She thanked Kiva and hopes it will continue cooperation with WSDS and make their lives happy ones.  She is also glad for the support and believes that this may bring a success in life. She says, “Thank you, Kiva.”

The rest of the group members are also engaged in charcoal business.

loans.use: To purchase a portion of land on rent, cut woods and burn charcoal for selling to support the family and kids education

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es: Luis está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar enseres para su vivienda, como ollas, platos, entre otros, y de esta manera poder mejorar su calidad de vida, así el seguirá trabajando como vendedor en el grifo donde labora y seguirá ahorrando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Comprar un terreno”.
texts.en: Luis is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to their help he will be able to buy household items for his home, such as pots, plates and other articles, and in this way improve his quality of life. This way he will continue working as an attendant in the gas station where he works, and will keep saving in order to make his greatest dream a reality: "To buy a piece of land."

loans.use: To buy household items.

loans.name: Better Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Better” group. They are small-scale businesswomen based in Waterloo, a small town in western Sierra Leone. Together, they are requesting a loan of 3,600,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more profits and consequently improve their standard of living.

The featured leader of this group is Hawa. Hawa is age 41. She was born in Masimra village in northern Sierra Leone. She is married and has three children who are attending primary and secondary schools.

Hawa sells market food: onions, salt, pepper, tomatoes, etc., and has been doing business for many years now. With her share of this loan, she is going to buy the above-mentioned items in bulk to add to her current stock.

(Also included in the photo is a former group member who has temporarily decided not to collect a loan this time).

loans.use: to buy onions, salt, pepper, tomatoes, etc., in bulk to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
Ana de 24 años de edad, es  madre soltera, estudio hasta educación media y ella tiene que velar por su sustento diario y la de su hijo de 3 años de edad, ya que el padre se ha desentendido de ellos. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. A realizar sus actividades agrícolas.  

Ana  se dedica al cultivo de maíz, camina 2 Km para llegar a la parcelas donde siembra y ademas se dedica al cuido de animales (vacas), oficio que aprendió de sus padres.   

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos vacas que le venden, para producir  leche  y ofrecerla a sus vecinos y en los alrededores de donde reside para obtener un ingreso adicional.

 Ana  planea en un futuro, poder comprar mas animales y poder producir mas leche para la venta y lácteos (quesillo, queso, crema, etc)
texts.en:
Ana, 24 years old, is a single mother who studied up to middle school. She has to work to sustain herself and her 3-year-old son. The father refuses to recognize them. She rises at 5:00 am to carry out her agricultural activities. 

Ana raises corn. She walks 2 klm to arrive at the parcels where she sows her crops. In addition, she cares for her livestock (cows), a skill that she learned from her parents.   

The loan Ana solicits from Fundacion Campo is for purchasing 2 cows currently for sale, to produce milk to sell to her friends and residents of the areas surrounding her home, for additional income.

Ana's plans for the future are to purchase more cows in order to be able to produce more milk and make milk products (cheeses, cream, etc.) to sell.

loans.use: to buy two cows that are for sale, to produce milk to sell to neighbors and residents of areas surrounding her residence for addditional income.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: María de 32 años de edad reside junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de seis y un año de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de perfumería, cremas, queso y miel. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad, desde hace 5 años. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de inventario ya que desea incrementar sus ventas y por consecuencia sus ingresos. Con el monto solicitado comprará: lociones, cremas, queso y miel, espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder hacer la inversión lo antes posible.
texts.en:
María is 32 years old and lives with her life partner and her two children who are six and one year old. She sells perfumes, creams, cheese and honey. She has been a street vendor selling in the main areas of her town for almost five years.

She is asking for this loan through FUSAI in order to invest in her business and buy as much stock for inventory that she needs in order to increase her sales and therefore her income. With the amount she has requested she will buy lotions, creams, cheese and honey. She hopes to have this funding in order to make her investment as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy lotions, creams, cheese and honey.

loans.name: Brenda Lisbeth

texts.es: Brenda de 22 años habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad quienes a la fecha se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Brenda posee una pequeña tienda en la que vende variedad de productos como: dulces, galletas, pan dulce, golosinas, etc. Así se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con mucho esfuerzo junto a su compañero de vida han logrado construir su vivienda la cual es su principal patrimonio. Lastimosamente, no lograron terminar de construir el corredor a la casa por lo que cuando llueve el agua se filtra mojando sus pocas pertenencias y deteriorando las paredes de la vivienda. Esta es la razón por la que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: pilares, lámina, y polines para construir el corredor lo antes posible.
texts.en: Brenda is 22 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and two children, ages 7 and 2 who attend the local public school.  Brenda has a small store where she sells a variety of products such as candy, cookies, sweet bread, snacks, etc.  She earns a living and supports her household this way.  She and her husband have managed to build a house with great effort, unfortunately they were not able to finish the roof and the water leaks in when it rains, soaking all of their few positions and damaging the walls.  She is asking for this loan through FUSAI to buy supplies such as pillars, metal, and girders to finish the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to finish her roof.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: Matilde de 59 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hijo quien con muchos esfuerzos se encuentra estudiando en la Universidad. Matilde hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su hijo lo necesario ya que para ella lo más importe es él y desea que tenga mejores condiciones a las que ella ha tenido. Matilde se dedica a la comercialización de productos de primera necesidad como: huevos, pollo, chorizo y lácteos. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad. Desea invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería ya que desea mejorar sus ganancias y este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercaderia para el negocio como: huevos, embutidos, lácteos, pollo y carne.
texts.en:
59-year old Matilde lives in her own house together with her son who after a great deal of hard work is studying at university. She does all she can to give her son the necessities of life. In her eyes he is the most important person in her life, and she wants him to have a better standard of living than she had.

Matilde sells basics such as eggs, chicken, sausage, and milk products in the main streets of the town where she lives. She now wishes to invest in her business by buying more merchandise as she wants to earn more money. Her business is her main source of income.

She is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy items such as eggs, cold cuts, dairy products, chicken and meat.

loans.use: buy eggs, cold cuts, dairy products, chicken and meat

loans.name: Lideres De Villa Rica Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Líderes De Villa Rica” está conformada por 11 socios trabajadores y responsables, la cual pasan a su 6to ciclo. Rosa de 38 años es casada y tiene 03 hijos aún dependientes. Rosa comenzó en la venta de prendas de vestir, por problemas económicos tuvo que dejar dicha actividad. Actualmente brinda servicio de limpieza obteniendo ingresos para su hogar. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de algunos medicamentos para su padre, ya que se encuentra delicado de salud. El deseo de Rosa es de volver a ofrecer sus prendas de vestir. El grupo “Líderes De Villa Rica” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. Rosa se encuentra de pie es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo negro.
texts.en: The “Líderes De Villa Rica” communal bank is made up of 11 responsible and hardworking members in their sixth cycle.  Rosa is 38 years old, married, and has three children who still depend on her.  Rosa began selling clothing because of financial difficulties that she had.  Now she provides cleaning services to earn money for the household.  She will use the money from this loan to buy some medication for her father because he is in poor health.  Rosa wants to start selling clothing again.  The “Líderes De Villa Rica” group is grateful to those who made this possible through the loan.  Rosa is standing and is the second from the right wearing a black polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy medication

loans.name: Dúo Roca Fuerte Group

texts.es:
Dúo Roca Fuerte
Duo conformado por don Martin Rocael  es propietario de un taller de electromecánica desde hace mas de 18 años, tiene muchos clientes por el buen servicio que presta y solicita el crédito para comprar cables y materiales para realizar su trabajo de electromecanica esperando que ustedes le puedan ayudar con el credito que esta solicitando el ya trabajo un credito anterior y no a caido en mora les agradese por la ayuda que le han brindado en su negocio.
texts.en:
The Dúo Roca Fuerte group of two people was formed by Martin Rocael who has been the owner of an electromechanical workshop for more than 18 years. He has many customers because of the good service he offers. 

He is asking for this loan to buy cables and supplies in order to do his electromechanical work. He is hoping for support through the loan he is requesting. He had a previous loan and did not fall behind in payments. He is grateful for the help that has been given to his business.

loans.use: to buy materials for an electromechanical workshop

loans.name: Dúo Antidoto Group

texts.es:
Dúo Antídoto

Este Dúo está conformado por doña María Irene de 30 años se dedica desde hace más de diez años a la crianza de marranos y pollos. En el crédito anterior doña Irene tuvo 40 días de atraso debido a que se enfermo y no pudo trabajar pero gracias a Dios ya está bien y ha empezado a trabajar arduamente. El sueño de ella es tener ingresos para sacar adelante a sus hijos, ella quiere que lleguen a tener alguna profesión. Solicita el crédito para la compra de concentrado, y animales para criar y engordar. También agradece el gran apoyo que Fape Y Kiva le ha brindado.
texts.en:
The Dúo Antídoto group was formed by María Irene who is 30 years old. She has been raising pigs and chickens for more than 10 years. Irene was 40 days late in her previous loan as she was sick and could not work but thanks to God she is well and has begun to work hard. Her dream is to have income in order to bring up her children and she wants them to have a profession. 

She is asking for this loan to buy animals to raise and fatten and animal feed. She is grateful for the support that Fape and Kiva have provided her.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise and fatten

loans.name: Nibia Marina

texts.es: La señora Nubia habita en el municipio de Ticnatepe en la comarca llamada Las Dispersas junto a su esposo e hijos, quienes son mayores de edad y la apoyan economicamente ya que trabajan, ella se dedica a la cosecha de Cafe desde hace 30 años, tiene aproximadamente 9 manzanas de tierras cultivadas, el credito lo solicita para darle mantenimiento especificamente a 2 manzanas de cafe que estan proximas a sacar, comprara insumos agricolas como: completo, urea, triple, etc. ademas pagara parte de mano de obra en el caso de cortadores contratados. Agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le estan brindando
texts.en: Nubia lives in the town of Ticnatepe in the region of Las Dispersas together with her husband and their children, who are older and who help her financially by working. She has worked as a coffee farmer for 30 years, and she has nine plots of farmland. She is requesting this loan for upkeep on two specific plots of land that she is about to harvest, to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, as well as to pay for contracted laborers. She is grateful for the assistance that Kiva and Afodenic are providing.

loans.use: purchase agricultural products.

loans.name: Erliz Milagro

texts.es:
La señora Erliz es una persona emprendedora, honesta y seria, vive con su esposo  e hija, en el sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la compra y venta refrescos y gallinas.
Don Erliz el préstamo lo necesita para la compra refrescos y gallinas. Con el préstamo espera que las ventas de su negocio aumenten al tener más mercancía que ofrecer a los clientes y cubrir las necesidades de los mismos y con esto mejorar su situación económica.
Doña Erliz espera que a un corto plazo siga creciendo y consolidándose para que su negocio se  convierta en el más grande y reconocido de la región y seguir apoyando a su familia y que su hija se convierta en una persona honesta con principios y valores. 



Choluteca, Honduras  – Diciembre   del   2013
texts.en:
Erliz is an entrepreneurial, honest, and serious woman.  She lives with her husband and their daughter in the south of Honduras.  Her business is to buy and sell beverages and chickens.

Erliz is seeking this loan in order to buy beverages and chickens.  With the loan, she hopes that the sales in her business will increase due to the fact that she has more merchandise to offer her customers and can better meet their needs.  This will improve her economic situation.

Erliz hopes that in a short time her business will continue to grow so that it becomes the biggest and most recognized in the area.  She hopes to continue supporting her family and she hopes that her daughter becomes an honest person with strong principles and values.

loans.use: to buy beverages and chickens for her business.

loans.name: Johana Vannesa

texts.es: Johana está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su apoyo y gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder colocar falso piso en la vivienda donde habita ya que el piso aun es de tierra y de esta manera podrá ir mejorando su calidad de vida y luchar por hacer realidad su gran sueño:2 Terminar de construir su vivienda y poder darle una vida digna a su hijo de 10 años”.
texts.en:
Johana is very thankful for the Kiva lenders since this is the second time that she has gotten support. Thanks to the help that has been provided, she will be able to buy construction materials so that she can install a floor in her home.  The current floor is made of dirt. 

This will improve her quality of life and will help her make her biggest dream to come true - to finish building her home and to be able to provide a dignified life to her 10-year-old son.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto de 55 años de edad, es una persona que solo estudio hasta noveno grado.

 Roberto  se dedica a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de sus padres,  para llegar a la parcelas camina 3 Km.  trabaja durante toda la mañana, mientras su esposa en la mañana ordeña y se dedica a  vender la leche y luego en el transcurso de la tarde el cuida unos animales.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una vaca y producir mas leche para la venta. Con el objetivo de obtener mejores ingresos.  

Él desea comprar mas vacas, para producir lácteos como queso, crema, quesillo, etc.
texts.en:
55-year old Roberto only attended school up to grade 9. He is a farmer and learned about farming from his parents. To get to his fields, he walks 3 km. He works there in the mornings while his wife milks the cows and sells the milk. In the afternoon hours he tends to the animals.

The loan that Roberto is seeking will be used to buy a cow so he can obtain more milk to sell and earn more money. He wants to buy more cows so he can produce milk products such as cheese, cream, and cream cheese.

loans.use: buy a cow and obtain more milk to sell

loans.name: Sai Luong Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bang, a 24-year-old Thai woman, currently lives with her husband, 2 kids, and the in-laws. One of Bang's kid is in elementary and the other is 7 months old. Bang and her husband work on their family VAC model, which includes a fish pond, farm, plants, cattle and poultry. She will use the loan to buy more fertilizer, pigs, and fish. 

She hopes that with more savings and stability in her income, she can improve her family's living standard and send her kids to school. Bang is the team leader of Sai Luong Group, which consists of 6 ethnic Thai women. In the picture, she stands first from the right.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer, pigs and fish.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 58 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su grupo familiar. Para Ángala y su esposo lo más importante son sus hijos y es por ellos que hacen todo lo que esta a su alcance para darles lo necesario. Ella se dedica a la venta de esencias naturales, la venta la realiza de forma ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo. Gracias a la calidad de sus esencias muchas personas la prefieren ya que son efectivas para dolores de estomago, y cabeza. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de esencias naturales las cuales son muy demandadas pro su efectividad.
texts.en:
Ángela is 58 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their family.  For Ángela and her husband, the most important things in the world are their sons.  They do everything they can to provide them with what they need.

She has sold essential oils door-to-door for a long time.  Thanks to the quality of her oils, people prefer them.  They are very effective against stomach pains and headaches. 

She is seeking a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of a variety of essential oils, which are in high demand due to their effectiveness.

loans.use: to buy a variety of essential oils.

loans.name: Dúo Cantares Group

texts.es:
DUO CANTARES
La señora Delma de 23 años de edadm, se dedica a la venta de ropa es muy jovencita pero a pesar de eso ellas está luchando para su futuro. Ella no tiene local solo vende en los mercados de Chimaltenango y acatenango  y  ya tiene sus clientes y gracias a Dios le va bien tiene buena venta y esta vez quiere invertir más para tener ganancias en esta época  sus sueño es tener un local propio, ella ya trabajo un credito anterior y no cayo en mora,espera que nuevamente le puedana ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
Delma, 23 years old, is a member of the Duo Cantares group. She works selling clothing. Despite being very young she is fighting for her future. She does not have a facility but sells only in the markets of Chimaltenango and Acatenango and already has clientele. Thanks to God things are going well and the sales are good. 

At this time she wants to invest more in order to have income for this season. Her dream is to have her own facility. She already had a previous loan and did not fall behind in payments. She is hoping for support once again with this new loan she has requested.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Irma Yolanda

texts.es: Doña Irma es propietaria de una tienda de comestibles en la que ofrece a sus clientes artículos de consumo diario como lo son: Azúcar, Frijol, Jabón, Golosinas, Arroz, y artículos de consumo diario. Irma es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de 8 años y este es el motivo que le impulsa a seguir trabajando diariamente. Su sueño es darle estudio a su hijo hasta llegar a graduarse y cuenta que su niño también le ayuda a despachar en la tienda. Sus pagos fueron puntuales y adelanto dos cuotas. Agradece el apoyo y se compromete a ser responsable es sus depósitos.
texts.en:
Irma is the owner of a food store in which she offers her customers daily food items such as sugar, beans, ham, candies, rice, and others.  Irma is a single mother and she has an 8-year-old son.  He is her motivation to work hard every day.

Her dream is to provide her son with an education and to see him graduate.  She also wants to mention that her son works with her in the store.  Her payments have been on time and twice they were paid early. She is thankful for the support and promises to be responsible with her repayments.

loans.use: to buy food.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería como juguetes al por mayor para su negocio de venta de juguetes, sobre todo por las fiestas navideñas y de año nuevo, de esta manera ella podrá mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos y así seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Ser una distribuidora de juguetes”.
texts.en: Luisa appreciates the help that Kiva lenders have given her, since she will now be able to buy merchandise for her toy store, such as toys in bulk. Her sales and income will increase, especially during the Christmas and New Year holidays. This way, she will continue fighting to make her dream come true: to become a toy distributor.

loans.use: to buy toys in bulk for her store.

loans.name: Ricardo Edmundo

texts.es:
Ricardo, tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero y vive en la ciudad de ICA, junto a su linda familia.
Ricardo,  trabaja como encargado del reparto de papa y maíz en una distribuidora de la cuidad, trabajo el cual lo realiza con mucho empeño y responsabilidad.
Ricardo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios KIVA, ya que el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de una cocina para su hogar
El sueño de Ricardo es estudiar una carrera, ser un buen profesional, tener su casa propia y de esta manera darle una mejor calidad de vida a su madre.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 22 years old, single, and lives in Ica with his wonderful family. He is in charge of the delivery of potatoes and corn for a local distributor, a job he does with commitment and responsibility.

Ricardo is very grateful to Kiva donors since he will be able to buy a stove for his home with the money. His goals are to take further courses so he can get a good job, have a house of his own, and provide his mother with a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy a stove

loans.name: Thalia Margot

texts.es: Thalia esta agradecida por el apoyo y la oportunidad que le brindan los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su hogar, de esta manera podrá conservar mejor sus alimentos y seguirá luchando para poder ir mejorando su calidad de vida y poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Thalia is thankful for the support and the opportunity that is being provided to her by the Kiva lenders.  

Thanks to the help, she will be able to buy a refrigerator for her home to better keep her food.  She will continue fighting to improve her quality of life and to make her biggest dream come true - to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge Luis, tiene 23 años, vive en casa familiar con su esposa e hijo de 2 años, es de profesión farmacéutico, labora en una empresa de su localidad ejerciendo su carrera profesional, además en sus tiempos libres maneja una moto taxi el cual le genera un ingreso extra para solventar los gastos de su familia. El beneficiario utilizara el crédito mejorar su vivienda (compra de pintura, sillas, cocina, utensilios de cocina, entre otros). Su sueño es tener un negocio de venta de ropa.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis, 23, lives in a house with his wife and his two-year-old son. He is a pharmacist and works for a local company. During his free time, he drives a mototaxi, receiving an extra income to cover his family’s expenses. 

Jorge will use this loan to make some home improvements. He will buy paint, chairs, kitchen utensils and other things. His dream is to open a clothing business.

loans.use: to make some home improvements. He will buy paint, chairs and kitchen utensils, among other things.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan está muy feliz y agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su gran ayuda el podrá comprar abano, fertilizantes, solventar los gastos de regadío, arado, entre potros para poder mantener su cultivo de platino, con lo cual podrá tener un cultivo sano y poder tener una buena cosecha, de esta manera el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir trabajando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Ser una gran agricultor en su ciudad”.
texts.en: Juan is very happy and grateful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to their great support he will be able to purchase manure and fertilizers to cover the costs of irrigation, plowing, etc. to be able to maintain his plantain crops. He will be able to have a healthy crop and be able to have a good harvest. In this way he will be able to improve his income and continue working to be able to realize this great dream: to be a great farmer in his city.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Ana Karen

texts.es:
Ana Karen, tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera y vive en la calurosa ciudad de ICA en el distrito de Parcona. Actualmente se decida a la venta de productos de belleza, y a la vez también estudia la carrera de ingeniería química en la universidad de ICA.
Por más de  dos años Ana Karen vende estos productos de belleza, negocio el cual le va muy bien, sus principales clientes son sus vecinos y compañeros de la universidad, ella es una persona muy responsable y empeñosa.
Ana Karen, está muy agradecida con los prestatarios de KIVA, ya que el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de más productos de belleza.
El sueño de Ana Karen es culminar su carrera de Ingeniería química y se una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Ana Karen is 24 years old, she is single, and she lives in the warm city of Ica in the Parcona district. Currently she sells beauty products while she attends the University of ICA where she is studying to become a chemical engineer.

For more than 2 years, Ana Karen has sold beauty products and this business has gone very well.  Her best customers are her neighbors and friends from the university.  She is a very responsible and earnest person.

Ana Karen is thankful to the Kiva lenders.  The money will be used to invest in the purchase of more beauty products.  Her dream is to complete her degree in Chemical Engineering and to be a good professional worker.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Ten Nua Group

texts.en:
This is a 43-year-old woman of Thai minority; her name is Hoai. She's married with her two children who still attend school. She and her husband are working as farmers with a lot of agricultural activities, including growing rice and cereal, and breeding poultry and cattle. 

She is now preparing for the next harvest and wants to buy a lawn mower, but it's difficult for her to approach capital. Hence, the loan from Anh Chi Em Program would help her continue her business. 

She hopes that by her constant effort in producing, her children would be more abundant in life, and that both of them will go to college and change their current circumstance. 

Hoai is the team leader of the Ten Nua group, which consists of ten Thai minority members. In the picture, Hoai is standing first from the right.

loans.use: to buy a lawn mower for the field.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: La  señora Delia tiene 20 años de edad, de estado civil soltera actualmente vive con sus padres, pero económicamente es independiente, se dedica a la actividad agrícola en un terreno que le heredaron, en el cual produce papa y locoto con rotación de cultivos. Actualmente solicita un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas (semilla de papa, abono orgánico y productos agroquímicos) de esta forma podrá sembrar en más superficie de terreno y lograra mejorar sus ingresos económicos con el fin de ahorrar para construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Delia is 20 years old, single, and currently living with her parents, although she is economically independent. She works in agriculture, on land that she inherited, where she produces potatoes and peppers, with crop rotation.

She is seeking a loan to purchase agricultural supplies (seed potatoes, organic fertilizer, and agrochemical products) so that she will be able to sow a greater area of land. 

In this way she will be able to improve her income, for the purpose of building her own house.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies (seed potatoes, organic fertilizer, and agrochemical products).

loans.name: 23 De Septiembre  (Manta) Group

texts.es:
El Grupo Da Crédito 23 De Septiembre  se reúne cada 15 días en Las Cumbres en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse hace un tiempo  atrás y formar este Grupo de Crédito el cual les ha servido de mucho para aumentar sus negocios. Ellos se dedican a diversas actividades pero en su mayoría al comercio informal.
Don Manuel es socio de este grupo, tiene 61 años de edad, está divorciado pero de esa  relación tiene seis hijos  mayores de edad,  uno de sus hijos vive con él junto a su familia ya que el está comprometido y vive con la mujer y sus hijos pequeños.
Toda la vida el señor Manuel se ha dedicado a trabajar para que a su familia nunca le faltara nada, el se dedica a la venta de pescado, tiene un local arrendado en un mercado local en el cual trabaja todos los días desde hace más de 30 años, muy de madrugada el abre su local para recibir el mejor pescado que le llevan sus proveedores para luego vender a sus clientes, lo que más vende es el pescado por libras de picudo, albacora, bonito entre otros, sus clientes lo prefieren por que les despacha  el pescado fresco y con el peso correcto.
Este crédito es para comprar pescado. Este es su primer ciclo y espera que el crédito le ayude en su negocio, a él lo trajo su nuera que ya lleva más tiempo en el grupo, sus sueños son tener un local propio para no pagar arriendo.
texts.en:
Credit Group 23 de Septiembre (September 23) meets every 15 days in Las Cumbres in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches which people go to year-round, and also for its unparalleled beauty and many tourist attractions. These people decided to get together some time ago and formed this credit group which has been very helpful in growing their businesses. They do various kinds of work but almost all engage in informal commerce. 

Manuel is a member of this group.  He is 61 years old, divorced but has six grown children from that relationship. One of his children lives with him together with his family.  As he is engaged, his fiancee her small children live with them. Manuel has worked all his life so that his family would not lack for anything.  He sells fish and has a rented stand in a local market where he has worked every day for more than 30 years. He opens his stall at the crack of dawn to take delivery from his vendors of the best fish.  He then sells to his customers. He mostly sells fish by the pound such as bicuda, albacore tuna,  bonito, and others. His customers prefer to buy from him because his fish is fresh and he weighs it correctly.

This loan is to buy fish.  This is his first cycle and he hopes it will help his business.  His daughter-in-law brought him to the group as she has been with them longer.  His dreams are to have his own stall so he won't have to pay rent.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: Patricia está muy feliz y agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar zapatos, ropa al por mayor, y artículos de bazar, para poder abastecer su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa y bazar, ya que con su pequeño negocio y su pequeño trabajo en una institución de su ciudad puede solventar los gastos de su hogar, sobre todo porque es madre de un pequeño de 2 años al cual quiere mucho, así Patricia podrá seguir trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una bodega de venta de abarrotes”.
texts.en: Patricia is very happy and grateful for Kiva loans.  Thanks to the support she has received she will be able to buy shoes, clothing at wholesale and sundry items to stock her small business selling these things. With her small business and her small job with an institution in the city she can pay her household expenses.  This is especially important because she is the mother of a two-year-old child whom she loves very much. In this way Patricia will be able to continue to work and struggle to realize her big dream: to have a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy clothing and other sundry items

loans.name: Josseline Yaneth

texts.es: Josseline tiene 20 años de edad y es madre soltera de un hijo de 4 años de edad. Ella trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace mucho tiempo y de esta forma lleva la economía de su hogar y da a su hijo el sustento diario. Con mucho esfuerzo comenzó a construir su vivienda la cual todavía le hace falta algunos detalles como el baño y la cocina ya que para el resto ya tiene el material. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales que hacen falta como: lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena, grava y madera. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento para terminar su vivienda lo antes posible y poderse mudar junto con su hijo.
texts.en: Josseline is 20 years old and is the single mom of a four-year-old boy.  She has been working as a domestic employee for a long time and this is how she covers her household expenses and provides for her son. With great effort she has begun to build a house.  She still needs to build the bathroom and the kitchen but she has the materials for the rest of the house.  She is asking FUSAI for this loan so she can buy the materials she still needs such as: metal plates, cement, sand, gravel and wood.  She hopes to receive this financing so she can finish building her home as soon as possible and be able to move in with her son.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, cement, sand, gravel and wood to finish the bathroom and kitchen

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 30 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 9 y 4 años de edad. Miguel trabaja como empleado pesando maíz y frijol en una tienda cercana a su localidad. Miguel desea mejorar su vivienda reparando el piso ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorado y desea dar a su familia condiciones mas higiénicas. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo de piso, cemento y arena para proceder a las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en: Miguel is 30 years old and lives in his own house with his partner and two children ages 9 and 4. Miguel works as an employee weighing corn and beans in a nearby store in his community. Miguel wishes to improve his home, repairing the floor that today is deteriorating and he wishes to give his family cleaner living conditions. Thus he seeks a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying floor brick, cement, and sand to proceed with the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy floor brick, cement, and sand to improve his home's floor.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras De Santa Eulalia Group

texts.es: Las socias del grupo “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE SANTA EULALIA” se encuentran muy contentas por estar pasando el 02 ciclo ya que para ellas es una nueva experiencia trabajar en grupo. Luz cumple la función de presidenta en el grupo. Ella tiene 42 años es conviviente con 03 hijos dependientes. Ella tiene un negocio familiar el cual consiste en la compra y venta de de material reciclable botellas descartable papel fierro cobre bronce y aluminio. Ella se siente satisfecha ya que en la actualidad ha mejorado su negocio. Luz tiene como fin adquirir un depósito para guardar sus materiales reciclables. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de más material reciclable fierros aluminios y papeles. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Luz es la que viste chompa a rayas de color naranja amarillo y verde.
texts.en:
The members of the “Las Emprendedoras de Santa Eulalia” group are very happy to be going through the second loan cycle, since working in a group is a new experience for them.

Luz is the president of the group. She is 42 years old and she lives with her partner and her 3 dependent children. She has a family business which consists in buying and selling recyclable materials such as disposable bottles, paper, iron, copper, bronze, and aluminum. She feels satisfied because her business has now improved. 

Luz’s goal is to get a place where she can store her recyclables. She will invest the loan in the purchase of more recyclable materials such as iron, aluminum, and paper. 
 
The group thanks the Kiva lenders for the loan that they have given.  Luz is seen wearing the sweater with orange, yellow, and green stripes.

loans.use: to purchase more recyclable materials such as iron, paper and aluminum.

loans.name: Dorotea

texts.es: La señora Dorotea es una persona mayor, pero es muy trabajadora y tiene ganas de superarse.Vive en una zona rural de Tiraque y tiene un  dependiente económico. La actividad que realiza es netamente agrícola y los principales productos que cultiva son papa, haba y oca, la siembra de estos cultivos lo realiza en sus propias parcelas que se hallan situados en su comunidad, como quiere superarse solicita un crédito para capital de operaciones para la compra de abono gallinaza y semilla de papa, de tal forma lograra obtener mayor producción y a través de eso podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Dorotea is an older woman, but is very hard-working and has the will to succeed. She lives in a rural area of Tiraque and has one dependent. She works purely in agriculture and her principle products are growing potato, bean, and oca. She plants the crops on her own land located in her community. As she wants to be successful she seeks a loan for capital in order to buy chicken manure and potato seed, so that she will be able to obtain a greater production and in this way she will be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy chicken manure and potato seed.

loans.name: Dúo Kairos De Chimaltenango Group

texts.es:
DUO KAIROS DE CHIMALTENANGO
La señora María Etelvina de 41 años de edad,es casada,  desde hace 5 años fabrica servitas y teje güipiles,  ubicada en San Juan Comalapa, y que a base de esfuerzos logro establecer y mejorar su vivienda, a través de su negocio ella  ha mantenido y  a sacado adelante a su familia.
El sueño de la señora María Etelvina es poder mejorar la calidad de su vida y la de su familia a través del microcrédito que está solicitando a FAPE/KIVA; con el préstamo quiere comprar materia prima para tejer para seguir creciendo con su negocio.
texts.en:
DUO KAIROS DE CHIMALTENANGO

Mrs. María Etelvina is 41 years old, married, and has worked for 5 years making clothing and weaving textiles. She is located in San Juan Comalapa and because of her efforts has been able to establish and improve he home. Through her business she has maintained and supported her family.

Her dream is to be able to improve the quality of life for herself and her family through the loan she is seeking from FAPE/KIVA; with the loan she wants to buy materials to weave in order to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to buy materials to make traditional clothing.

loans.name: Trabajando Unidos Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Trabajando Unidos” está conformada por 05 socias emprendedoras y responsables.  Este es el caso de Leonidas de 44 años casada con 04 hijos 02 de ellos en etapa escolar. Leonidas comenzó con brindando productos de primera necesidad con mucho pudo implementar su negocio. Actualmente también ofrece servicio de llamadas telefónicas. Se siente feliz pues cada día sigue  mejorando. El crédito que solicitó lo destinó para la compra de abarrotes, bebidas y golosinas. El anhelo de Leonidas es de seguir creciendo su negocio. El grupo “Trabajando Unidos” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Ella se encuentra de pie, es la segunda del lado derecho y viste polo color morado.
texts.en: The communal bank “Trabajando Unidos” (Working Together) consists of 5 enterprising and responsible members. This is the case of Leonidas, who is 44 years old, married, with 4 children two of whom are school age. Leonidas began by providing basic need items as she started her business. Today she also offers services to make telephone calls. She is happy since every day she continues to improve. The loan she seeks will be used to buy groceries, beverages, and candy. Leonidas' goal is to continue growing her business. The group "Trabajando Unidos" is grateful to the Kiva investors for the help they provide and promise to continue working well. Leonidas is standing, the second person from the right side in a purple shirt.

loans.use: to buy groceries, beverages, and candy.

loans.name: Dúo Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Dúo Esperanza, 
Este dúo está conformado por  Gabriel de 31 años,  el se dedica  a la confección de  sobre fundas,  manteles y cubrecamas, pantalones, camisas etc. El solicita el crédito para comprar telas, las cuales utilizará  para la confecciones de pantalones escolares, el aprovechará que en el mes de enero inicia nuevamente el ciclo escolar, ya que cuenta con clientes que lo conocen el desea cubrir la demanda de pedido que tenga para los próximos días.
texts.en:
Dúo Esperanza,

Gabriel is 31 years old and makes items such as pillowcases, tablecloths, bed covers, pants, shirts, etc. He seeks a loan to buy fabric which he will use to make school pants. He will take advantage of January being the month that starts the new school years, as he has customers who know him and he wishes to meet the demand that he will have in the upcoming days.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make clothing items.

loans.name: Cristo Rey De Nicolas De Pierola Group

texts.es: “CRISTO REY DE NICOLAS DE PIEROLA”  está conformada por socias trabajadoras y muy responsables en sus cuotas. Luisa tiene 59 años es casada con un hijo educando en la universidad y un pequeño nieto a quien apoya económicamente. Luisa se dedica a la costura desde muy joven y además de haber sido maestra de corte y confección. En la actualidad cuenta con puesto en donde hace arreglos y cose ha pedido de sus clientes.   El préstamo lo invertirá  en la remodelación de puesto de trabajo y algunos accesorios que le falta para su taller. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado.  Luisa es la persona más alta del grupo viste chompa negra.
texts.en:
The “Cristo Rey De Nicolas De Pierola” group is made up of hard working members who are very responsible with their payments.

Luisa is 59 years old and married, with a son who attends the university, and a little grandson whom she supports financially.  Luisa has worked in sewing since she was very young, in addition to having been a teacher of dressmaking. 

Currently she works doing mending and sewing at the request of her customers.  She will invest the loan in remodeling her work place and in some accessories that she needs for her workshop. 

The group thanks the Kiva lenders for the loan that they have given. Luisa is the tallest person in the group and she is seen wearing a black sweater.

loans.use: to remodel her workshop.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa de 58 años de edad habita en casa propia desde hace mucho tiempo. Rosa es un mujer muy trabajadora y responsable. Ella se gana la vida mediante la comercialización de verduras. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en su comunidad. Rosa solicita este este crédito para invertir en la construcción de un baño ya que como se puede observar en la fotografía lo tiene cubierto de plástico lo cual no es muy seguro. Con el crédito comprará lámina y madera. Además, desea instalar el servicio de la energía eléctrica ya que no cuenta con el servicio.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 58, has lived in her own house for a long time.  Rosa is a very hard-working and responsible woman.  She earns a living selling vegetables in an itinerant manner in her community.

Rosa is requesting this loan to build a bathroom.  As can be seen in the photograph, she has it covered in plastic, which is not very secure.  She will use the loan to buy metal sheeting and wood.  Also, she wishes to install electrical service because she does not have this service.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting and wood and to install electrical service.

loans.name: Dúo San Antonio Group

texts.es:
DÚO SAN ANTONIO
El grupo está conformado por Clara Luz quien se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y pavos desde hace 25 años, tiene 6 hijos menores  de edad ella necesita otro crédito para comprar más cerdos y así mismo comprarles  la comida  para que en poco tiempo ella los pueda vender en otra aldea, su deseo es seguir adelante y poder  aumentar  su crianza de animales  y tener almacenado todo  tipo de comida para sus animales,esperando que ustedes le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en: Clara Luz is a member of the Dúo San Antonio group. She has been rearing pigs and turkeys for 25 years. She has 6 children who are minors and she needs another loan to buy more pigs and also to buy them food so that she can sell them in another village soon after. Her dream is to get on and to be able to increase her animal-rearing and to be able to store all types of food for her animals. She hopes that you can help her with the loan that she is requesting.

loans.use: to buy animals (pigs) to sell.

loans.name: Miguel Santos

texts.es: Miguel está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que su apoyo va ser de mucha ayuda para el ya que tiene una parcela y con el dinero del crédito podrá construir un pozo para poder obtener agua para su regadío,  de esta manera podrá dar un mejor mantenimiento a su cultivo y seguir trabajando para poder dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y luchar por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia y darle una profesión a sus 2 hijos”.
texts.en: Miguel is deeply grateful to Kiva lenders: their support will be very helpful as he owns a plot of land where, thanks to the loan, he will be able to builds a well, in order to get water to irrigate the land. In this way he will be able to provide better care to his crops and to keep on working to provide his family with a better standard of living, on top of fighting to make his biggest dream come true: to have a house of his own and help his 2 children become professionals.

loans.use: To build a well for his land.

loans.name: Luis Felipe

texts.es: Luis está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le están brindando el podrá comprar mercadería para su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, como  como polos, short, bividis, faldas, entre otros; de esta manera podrá tener un ingreso mas para solventar los gastos del hogar, ya que también trabaja como chofer de taxi, así el podrá seguir esforzándose y trabajando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un local propia y una empresa de taxis”.
texts.en: Luis is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to buy merchandise for his small clothes shop such as polo shirts, shorts, underwear and skirts among others.  This will give him an extra income to be able to pay for his household expenses.  He also works as a taxi driver.  With this effort and hard work he hopes to be able to fulfill his dream “to have his own shop and a taxi service”.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as polos, shorts, underwear, skirts and others

loans.name: Mirco Efrain

texts.es: El señor Mirco tiene 32 años de edad, es soltero. Actualmente trabaja en el rubro de transporte público como taxista, vive en casa de su padre con sus hermanos y es de condición humilde pero se considera una persona trabajadora y responsable, desde muy pequeño supo laburar para poder sobrellevar su situación,  dadas sus limitaciones económicas logro cursar hasta la primaria dejando de lado sus estudios, es asi que solicita un crédito para refaccionar el techo de su casa, de forma que pueda darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Mirco is 32 year old and he is single. He currently works in public transportation as a taxi driver, and he lives in his parents’ house with his brothers. He comes from a humble background but he considers himself a responsible and hardworking person. He started working when he was very young in order to improve his conditions; due to his economic limitations he has succeeded in attending primary school only, abandoning his studies. He is currently requesting a loan to repair the roof of his house, in order to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To rapair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Merly Yasmin

texts.es: Merly está muy agradecida con el apoyo que le están brindando los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo Merly podrá compra mercadería para su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, como ropas de baño, short, polos, entre otros artículos, ya que este pequeño negocio le permite un dinero extra para poder solventar los gastos de su hogar, ya que ella traba en una pequeña institución de su ciudad como asistente, de esta manera ella seguirá luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un local para su negocio”.
texts.en: Merly is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders are offering her, since thanks to their support Merly will be able to buy merchandise for her little clothing sales business. She sell items such as bathing suits, shorts, and polo shirts, among other items, since this little business allows her some extra money for paying the household expenses. She works as an assistant in a small city institution. In this way she will continue striving to make a reality of her great dream: to have a retail location for her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Liz Marita

texts.es: Liz está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá comprar mercadería para su pequeño negocio de compra de ropa, lo cual le va permitir mejorar sus ingresos y poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios universitarios y poder sacar adelante a su familia y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Terminar su carrera universitaria y poder tener una casa propia".
texts.en: Liz is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the support that they are offering her, she will be able to buy merchandise for her little clothing sales business, which will allow her to improve her income, pay expenses for her university studies, support her family, and continue striving every day to make a reality of her great dream: to finish her university studies and be able to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell

loans.name: Ana Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana de 50 años de edad habita en casa propia desde hace 20 años. Ana es una mujer increíble ya que a pesar de su edad no se cansa de trabajar y luchar por mejores condiciones de vida. Ella se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos y de esta forma mantiene la economía de su hogar.  Habita en condiciones muy humildes y desea cambiar el techo de la vivienda ya que actualmente, se encuentra deteriorado. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Ana is 50 years old and she has been living in her own house for 20 years. Ana is an amazing woman, and despite her age she never stops working and fighting to improve her standard of living. She earns a living as a house maid, thus providing for the economy of her household. Her living conditions are very poor and she wants to change the roof of her house as it is currently run-down. She is requesting a loan to FUSAI to invest it in the purchase of galvanized metal sheets and wood to repair the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy galvanized metal sheets and wood.

loans.name: Georgina Ancelma

texts.es:
Georgina de 58 años de edad, casada con hijos mayores de edad. Es originaria de Leon, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país.  Se caracteriza por ser responsable, trabajadora con ganas de  superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económico no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar.
Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la elaboración de planchas y losetas de cemento para los fosas en los cementerios. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 10 horas diarias ofreciendo sus servicios. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo para la elaboración de las fosas como cemento, cal, hierro, arena, pintura. Para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.  Ancelma agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Georgina is 58, married and has adult children. She comes from Leon, which is in the west of the country. She is responsible, hard-working and has a desire to improve herself. In her free time she likes to enjoy the company of her children. Unfortunately, she was not able to study for a degree because of lack of funds, and so she had to work from a young age to help out with the household's costs. Thanks to her effort and her desire to get on in life, she works at making slabs and cement tombstones for cemetery graves. She works 10 hours a day in her business.

The reason for asking for the loan is to use the money for work materials for graves such as cement, lime, iron, sand and paint. She would like to increase her income in the near future. Georgina is grateful for the support given by Kiva lenders to allow people of few economic resources in poor countries such as Nicaragua to have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: to invest in capital to stock her business by making and selling tombstones for cemetery graves.

loans.name: Libia Lourdes

texts.es:
La Señora. Libia es socia del grupo de crédito Mujeres de Chilcatotoras, se encuentra formando parte de este hermoso grupo desde hace 5 años, todo este tiempo le ha servido para tener más amistad con todas sus compañeras y con los créditos mejorar la estabilidad de su hogar, vive por la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, por su geografía accidentada tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aún mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
La Señora Libia tiene 33 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos que se encuentran estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive con sus abuelitos con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.
