Doña Libia trabaja desde su casa, se dedica a la elaboración de polleras (vestimenta tradicional), este oficio lo aprendió trabajando, teje chompas, carteras, también cría animales como cerdos, cuyes y gallinas. 
Su nuevo crédito es para comprar tela cuyes y gallinas. Su meta es agrandar su taller.
texts.en:
Señora Libia is a member of the communal bank Mujeres de Chilcatotoras. She has been a part of this lovely group for five years; during that time, it has provided her with the friendship of her fellow members and with loans to improve the stability of her household. She lives in the parish of Tarqui in Cuenca, which has many places to enjoy nature because of its hilly terrain. The people there are friendly and courteous and still maintain their culture and traditions. 

Señora Libia is 33 years old. She is the single mother of two children who study in a little school in the city. She does not own her own home, so she lives with her grandparents, with whom she shares the household expenses.

Libia works from her home. She earns her living making traditional embroidered skirts—a trade she learned on the job—and knitting sweaters and purses; she also raises animals like guinea pigs and chickens.

The purpose of her new loan is to buy fabric, guinea pigs, and chickens. Her goal is to expand her workshop.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, guinea pigs, and chickens.

loans.name: Imelva Yurisa

texts.es: Imelva, tiene 40 años, es casada, tiene dos hijos mayores de edad, ellos son su fortaleza y motivación, ella solventa los gastos de estudios profesionales de sus hijos. Se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace 5 años, además percibe ingresos por alquiler de una piscina. Beneficiaria utilizará el crédito para mejoramiento de su negocio (compra de utensilios de cocina, mesas, sillas, entre otros). Su sueño es tener un Restaurante mas grande.
texts.en: Imelva, 40, is married and has two adult children who are her strength and motivation. She pays for her children's professional education expenses. She has made a living selling food for five years, in addition to earning income from renting out a pool. She will use the loan to improve her business by buying cooking utensils, tables, chairs, and other items. Her dream is to have a larger restaurant.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils, tables, chairs, and other items.

loans.name: Denith

texts.es:
Denith tiene 31 años y tiene su negocio de venta de comida y jugos, desde hace año y medio, con su pequeño negocio saca adelante a su pequeño hijo de 3 años, al cual quiere mucho y es su motor para poder salir adelante.

Denith esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una licuadora, implementos, y utensilios para la cocina, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando cada día para poder realizar su gran sueño:” Tener un negocio más grande”.
texts.en:
Denith is 31 years old.  She's had a business selling food and juices for a year and a half.  With her small business, she provides for her small 3 year-old child, who she loves very much.  Her son is her motivation to get ahead in life.

Denith is grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they have provided, she will be able to buy a blender, equipment, and utensils for her kitchen.  This will enable her to continue to strive each day to make her greatest dream a reality: "to have a bigger business."

loans.use: to buy a blender and kitchen equipment and utensils

loans.name: Mauro

texts.es: Mauro está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado Mauro podrá comprar una mototaxi, lo que le permitirá poder tener un ingreso extra ya que podrá alquilarla y con ello mejorar su calidad de vida y poder sacar adelante a sus pequeños hijos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en: Mauro is grateful for Kiva lenders who provide him with support. Mauro will now be able to buy a mototaxi, which will allow him to have extra income since he will be able to rent it out. This will improve his quality of life and help him move his young children forward as he keeps working toward his greatest dream: to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 14 años y su hijo de 12 años de edad. María se dedica y se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos. De esta forma colabora con la economía de su hogar y da a sus hijos el sustento diario. Junto a su compañero de vida ha logrado construir su vivienda la cual requiere de cambio de techo ya que se encuentra deteriorado y cuando llueve el agua se filtra. Además , desea instalar el servicio de luz eléctrica ya que no cuenta con el servicio. Con el monto solicitado María comprará lámina galvanizada y madera y pagará la instalación de la luz eléctrica.
texts.en:
Maria, 36, lives in her own house with her partner and two children; a 14-year-old daughter and a 12-year-old son.  Maria earns her living as a maid, in this way contributing to the household expenses and providing for her children.  

Together with her partner, she has been able to build a house, which needs its roof changing as it has deteriorated and when it rains it leaks.  She also wants to install electricity to provide light which it doesn’t have at the moment.  

With the requested loan, she will buy corrugated sheets and wood and pay for the installation of electric lighting.

loans.use: to buy corrugated sheets and wood to repair the roof of the house and to pay for the installation of electric lighting.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un humilde obrero de un fundo de su ciudad, con su trabajo puede salir adelante y sobre todo apoyar  con los gastos del hogar, trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable.

Jorge agradece el apoyo que le brindan los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, ladrillos, entre otros, para poder realizar mejoras en su vivienda, así podrá tener una vivienda segura y seguirá esforzándose para poder hacer realidad su sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria”
texts.en:
Jorge is a humble laborer in his area of the city.  Thanks to his job, he can get along and above all, help pay for the household expenses.  He works about nine hours a day and believes that he is doing well at work because he is a responsible worker.

Jorge is grateful for the support provided by Kiva and thanks to their help he will be able to buy building material such as cement, bricks and other things to make improvements to his home.  This will provide him with a safe house which will let him continue to work hard to fulfill his dream “to study at University”.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Rosita Lucia

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosita se encuentra desde hace 4 años en el grupo de crédito Mujeres de Chilcatotoras, le gusta esta su grupo porque existe mucha unión y solidaridad entre todas las mujeres. Vive por la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, por su geografía accidentada tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aún mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
La Señora Rosita tiene 30 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 9,7 y 2 años, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en la escuela, su esposo labora como albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su madre con quien comparte los gastos de su hogar. 
Doña Rosita se dedica a la crianza de animales como ganado, cerdos y cuyes, también a la agricultura que es para el consumo de su casa.
El dinero de su crédito es para comprar pollos y cuyes. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Señora Rosita has been in the "Mujeres de Chilcatotoras" communal bank for four years. She likes her group because the members are very close and supportive of each other. She lives in the parish of Tarqui in Cuenca, which has a lot of places to enjoy nature because of its hilly terrain. The people there are friendly and courteous, and they still maintain their culture and traditions.

Rosita is 30 years old. She is married and from that marriage, she has three children who are 9, 7, and 2 years old. Her two older children attend school and her husband works in construction. They don't have their own house, so they live in her mother's house and share the household expenses. Rosita earns her living raising animals like cattle, pigs, and guinea pigs. She also works in agriculture, growing crops for her household's consumption. 

The money from this loan is for buying chickens and guinea pigs. Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Lidia Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora Lidia se encuentra en su cuarto crédito que realiza a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del grupo de crédito Sector 3 Marías, le gusta esta forma de créditos porque le permite salir de la rutina de su trabajo y compartir gratos momentos con sus amigas. Vive por un sector perteneciente a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, este sector es muy turístico ya que es el mirador de la ciudad, su gente se dedica a la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.
La Señora Lidia tiene 34 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 4 hijos de 14, 6 y 3 años que son gemelos, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio, su segunda hija estudia en la escuela, su esposo se dedica a pulir pisos, la casa en la que viven es propia.
Doña Lidia se dedica a los quehaceres de su casa, cuida a sus hijos y cría pollos y cuyes. 
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de cuyes y pollos. Su meta es tener un negocio propio como un local de comida rápida.
texts.en:
Lidia is in her fourth loan cycle, which she is doing with her friends and group mates in the "Sector 3 Marias" credit group. She likes this form of credit because it allows her to deviate from the work routine and share pleasant moments with her friends. She lives in an area that is part of the Turi parish in Cuenca. This is a very touristic area because it has a vantage point of the city. Her people work in agriculture, animal raising, and sales.

Lidia, 34, lives in a civil union and has four children who are 14, 6, and 3-year-old twins. Her oldest child is in high school, and her second is in primary school. Her husband shines shoes for a living. They live in their own home.

Lidia takes care of the household chores. She also takes care of her children and raises chickens and guinea pigs.

She will invest this loan into buying guinea pigs and chickens. Her goal is to have her own business such as a fast food place.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Laura Lorena

texts.es:
Laura lorena desea conseguir el convenio con kiva ya que sta estudiando auxiliar de enfermería y quiere sacar adelante su carrera para luego seguir estudiando medicina y hacer su especialización en neurocirugía, para a si poner en practica los conocimientos que aprendió estudiando en campo alto ya que es una base para su profesión.
Es una persona responsable, comprometida con su estudio, desea aportar lo mejor de si misma para con las personas y con las instituciones.
Le sirve de ayuda el convenio ya que puede terminar su bachillerato y graduarse de auxiliar de enfermería y sacar el acta de grado, después entrar a la universidad con los conocimientos adquiridos en los dos años de estudio en campo alto y ponerlos en practica, aportar conocimientos en las instituciones en la cual trabajaría y a si obtener mas conocimientos en el area de la medicina y la salud de las personas.
texts.en:
Laura Lorena wishes to continue her agreement with Kiva and continue studying to be a nurses aid and advance her career, so that, later, she can continue to study medicine and pursue a specialization in nuerosurgery. She wishes to put in practice the knowledge she has learned studying at the upper campus, since it formed the basis for her profession.

Laura Lorena is a responsible person, dedicated to her studies, who desires to achieve the best she can, whether dealing with people or institutions.

Her agreement with Kiva is very helpful, allowing her to receive her diploma, graduating as a nurses aid. Laura Lorena will then enter the university with the knowledge acquired during her 2 years of study at the upper campus and put her learning into practice, acquiring added knowledge in the institutions where she works and, thus, obtaining more knowledge in the area of medicine and people's health.

loans.use: to finance the last of her initial education costs.

loans.name: Ana Lucinda

texts.es:
Lucinda es una persona que quiere superarse, sacar adelante una carrera y atravez de ella poder ayudar a su familia y poner a disposición su conocimiento a otras personas ya que ella hace muchos años trabaja en la cocina preparando platos especiales.
Las personas lo han degustado muy bien en el sitio de trabajo, a las personas les encanta su sason, y como a ella le fascina preparar sus platos deliciosos, tomo la desicion de estudiar, conocer mas la historia de la gastronomía, tener este conocimiento,y a si mismo poner a disposición de los demás personas que puedan degustar los platos que quieran.
No conocemos la historia de la gastronomía, es una tema muy largo y eterno que muchos desconocen y ella ha querido aprender y conocer mas de este tema.
texts.en:
Lucinda is a person who wants to improve herself, get on in her studies and through these be able to help her family and to put her knowledge to use to help others, since she has worked at preparing special dishes in the kitchen for many years. The people where she works have really enjoyed her food and are delighted with its flavour. As she adores preparing delicious dishes, she took the decision to study and to know about the history of gastronomy better, and in this way help other people sample the dishes they like.

We do not really know the history of gastronomy; it's a very long, eternal subject that many people are unfamiliar with, and she wanted to learn and know more about this subject.

loans.use: to complete her studies.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El Sr. Mario vive en la comunidad de Liriuni, tiene 38 años de edad, está casado y tiene tres hijos que aún están estudiando, percibe ingresos económicos de la actividad agrícola, produce papa, oca y
haba, y su esposa se dedica a la venta en una  tienda comercial. Actualmente viven en la casa de sus padres y solicita un crédito para la construcción de su propia vivienda ya que la casa en la que están actualmente se encuentra deteriorada, y con esta epoca de lluvia tiene muchas goteras, lo que más quiere es ofrecerle a su familia mejores condiciones para que puedan vivir más cómodamente.
texts.en: Mario lives in Liriuni. He is 38 years old. He is married and he has three children who are still in school. He receives income from farming. He grows potatoes, beans and geese. His wife works at a retail store. They currently live at his parents' house. They are applying for a loan in order to build their own house since where  they live now is deteriorating. With this rainy season, there are lots of leaks. What he wants most is to offer his family better conditions so that they can live more comfortably.

loans.use: build his home.

loans.name: Lucero

texts.es: Lucero, tiene 22 años, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres. En su propia vivienda tiene una bodega, en el cual ofrece el servicio de recargas virtuales de celulares. Beneficiaria utilizará el crédito para invertir en su negocio (compra de mercadería para la bodega y ampliar la línea virtual para las recargas). Su sueño a corto plazo es estudiar una carrera profesional, ayudar a sus padres a construir su casa para mejorar la calidad de vida de ellos.
texts.en: Lucero, 22, is a single woman who lives with her parents in their house.  In her own house, she has a grocery store in which she offers an online phone credit service.  She would get a lot of benefit if she could invest this loan in her business (buying supplies for the store and expanding the line of phone credit she offers).  Her short term dream is to study a profession and help her parents build their house to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the grocery store and expand the range of online phone credit.

loans.name: María Marleny

texts.es:
María es madre de un hijo de 9 años y vive en unión libre con su compañero sentimental.  A sus 50 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, vendiendo todo tipo de mercancía por catálogo, trabaja todos los días y sus principales clientes son vecinos, familiares y amigos, esto le ha permitido generar recursos para el sustento de su familia durante los últimos 15 años que lleva trabajando como independiente.
Con el ánimo de fortalecer su negocio, solicita el crédito para comprar mercancía en promoción y al por mayor (ropa, calzado, accesorios, cosméticos, perfumería, entre otros), esto le permitirá ofrecer mejor variedad  y un precio más bajo a sus clientes, lo que le ayudará a fidelizarlos y mejorar las ventas e ingresos.
El sueño de María es ampliar y fortalecer su negocio, ofreciendo a sus clientes mayor variedad de artículos de excelente calidad a buen precio y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, para disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida y dar a su hijo una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Maria lives in a civil union with her partner and has a 9-year-old son. At 50 years old, she works as an independent vendor, selling all kinds of merchandise from a catalogue. She works every day and her primary customers are her neighbors, family members, and friends. This has allowed her to earn income to support her family for the last 15 years, which she has done through working independently.

With the motivation of strengthening her business, she has requested a loan to buy promotional wholesale merchandise such as clothing, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and perfume. This will allow her to offer her customers a better variety of products at a lower price, which will help her build loyalty and improve her sales and income.

Maria's dream is to grow and strengthen her business, offering her customers a larger variety of excellent quality products at a good price. This will make her business more profitable so she can enjoy a better quality of life and give her son a better education.

loans.use: to buy wholesale promotional merchandise such as clothing, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and perfume.

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
San Jose están en el 3er ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas tienen la esperanza de poder ayudar a sus familias y por medio de ello poder superarse y ayudar a sus familias y sus seres queridos, ellas también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde la Sra. Vilma, quien en su encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir con ingresos bajos, por lo que debe esforzarse un poco más.
Está tratando de mejorar por medio de su trabajo, que consiste en la venta de prendas variadas que ella misma vende de manera ambulante, y por medio de ese trabajo tiene los ingresos para procurar dar a su familia un futuro mejor.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas, en especial de verano, ya que así podrá surtirse, a la vez que sigue con sus ventas.
texts.en:
San Jose is in the third cycle of the women’s communal bank program. All the women in the program hope to be able to help their families. Through the program, they hope to be able to do better and to help their families and loved ones. The women also form part of the program to eliminate poverty. Mrs. Vilma showed a level of poverty within level one in her survey, which means she has low income and has to work hard.

Mrs. Vilma is trying to improve her means of work which consists of selling various clothing. She sells it herself as a street vendor. This work provides the income to give her family a better future. 

Mrs. Vilma is requesting this loan to be able to buy clothing, especially summer clothing, so she will be able to have more stock and continue her sales.

loans.use: to buy summer clothing to sell.

loans.name: Una Buena Esperanza  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
Una Buena Esperanza es un grupo de crédito que esta formado por 6 mujeres quienes son amigas y comparten los mismos anhelos y objetivos que son mejorar la estabilidad de sus hogares, salir adelante y ofrecerles a sus hijos un mejor futuro. Se dedican a la crianza de animales y a la agricultura, aún mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Viven por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, lugar que goza de bellos paisajes y verdes campos.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Mariana,  tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 14, 5 y 2 años de edad, su primera hija está en el colegio y su segunda hija se encuentra en la escuela, su esposo labora como carpintero, la casa en la que viven es propia. 
Doña Mariana es una mujer que se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y a la venta de cosméticos, sus ventas las realiza recorriendo la ciudad, también se dedica a la crianza de animales como cuyes, cerdos y pollos, cultiva su terreno y lo que cosecha es para su casa y si existe un sobrante lo vende. 
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos y pollos. Su meta e terminar su casa.
texts.en:
‘Una Buena Esperanza’ is a credit group formed by six women who are friends who share the same dreams and goals.  These are to be able to improve the financial stability of their household, get along in life and provide their children with a better future.  They dedicate their time to raising animals and to agriculture, while still maintaining the culture and traditions of their villages.  They live around the Parish of Valle en Cuenca, an area which has beautiful countryside and green fields.

One of the members is Mariana, 33, who is married and has three children to this marriage, aged 14, 5 and 2.  Her first daughter is at high school and her second daughter is at primary school.  Her husband is a carpenter and they live in their own house.

Mariana takes care of the household chores and sells cosmetics.  She sells these all around the city.  She also raises animals such as guinea pigs, pigs and chickens.  She cultivates her own land and what she harvests is for her home and if any is left over then she sells it.

The loan she is asking for is to buy cosmetics and chickens.  Her goal is to finish her house.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and chickens.

loans.name: Estefanía

texts.es:
Estefanía es una joven emprendedora y activa de 22 años de edad, que, luego de culminar sus estudios secundarios se dedicó a buscar empleo para generar ingresos, pero por la inexperiencia laboral y por no tener estudios universitarios le fue imposible emplearse; por ello, hace aproximadamente 3 meses comenzó su propio negocio, vendiendo comidas rápidas en el sector donde reside, trabaja sola todos los días de 3 a 8 pm; así ha logrado generar los recursos necesarios para aportar a la economía del hogar.
Con el ánimo de fortalecer su negocio, solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor (panes, carnes frías, salsas, desechables, gaseosas, entre otros) y realizar mejoras locativas (arreglar la cocina), esto le permitirá tener disponibilidad de insumos para atender la demanda actual de su negocio, además podrá cumplir con las exigencias de sanidad y evitará sanciones futuras; así acreditará poco a poco su negocio y podrá dar una mejor imagen al establecimiento, lo que llamará la atención de los transeúntes.
Estefanía, con su espíritu de superación y su empuje, tiene como propósito principal para un futuro cercano, poder organizar mejor su negocio, fortalecerlo y posicionarlo en el mercado, ofreciendo más variedad de alimentos y así tener mayor rentabilidad para mejorar las condiciones de vida y bienestar en su familia.
texts.en:
Estefanía is an enterprising and energetic young woman of 22, who after finishing her high school studies dedicated herself to seeking employment in order to generate income. But because of lack of work experience, and not having a university education, it was impossible for her to find work. For this reason, approximately three years ago she started her business, selling fast food in the area where she lives. 

She works every day from 3:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m, and this way has managed to generate the necessary resources to contribute to the household finances. For the purpose of building up her business, she is requesting the help of the loan to buy supplies at wholesale (bread, cold cuts, sauces, disposables, soft drinks and other items) and undertake site improvements (fix the stove). This will allow her to have supplies available for meeting her business's current demand. In addition she will be able to meet health requirements and avoid future penalties. She will formalize her business little by little and be able to give it a better appearance, which will  attract the attention of passersby. 

Estefanía, with her spirit of self-improvement and her drive has as her main goal for the near future to better organize her business. She wants to build it up and position it in the market, offering a greater variety of food, and having greater profitability so that she can improve her family's living conditions and well-being.

loans.use: To buy stock at wholesale (bread, cold cuts, sauces, disposables, soft drinks and other items) and undertake site improvements (fix the stove).

loans.name: Sandra Yaneth

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer campesina de 38 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con el fruto de su trabajo.
Desde muy joven aprendió a realizar todas las labores agropecuarias ya que ha sido una tradición familiar que pasa de generación en generación; gracias a ello, hoy en día se dedica a trabajar en su negocio independiente como productora de leche, posee 10 vacas a las cuales ordeña diariamente y la producción es vendida a un vecino que posee tanques de frío y a diferentes tiendas y cafeterías del municipio; esto le ha generado ingresos para apoyar a su esposo a solventar los gastos familiares.
La cliente se ha caracterizado por su empuje, perseverancia y por ser una luchadora incansable; ha sobrepasado diversos obstáculos ocasionados por los altos insumos agrícolas y por la inestabilidad en el precio de venta de su producto; sin embargo ha sabido manejar estas situaciones de dificultad y ha salido adelante motivada por el amor de su familia.
Actualmente solicita el crédito para comprar una vaca productora de leche, con la que podrá reemplazar una que está en estado de gestación y no produce la misma cantidad de líquido; esto le permitirá cumplir con los contratos que posee y así mejorar las ventas e ingresos; que le abrirán paso para seguir luchando y fortalecer más su negocio, pues Sandra se proyecta ampliando su capacidad de producción con más animales en un futuro a mediano plazo; así tendrá la posibilidad de seguir apoyando económicamente a su familia y brindar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra, 38, is a farmer. She is married and has two children, who she has moved forward with her hard work.

From a young age, she learned farming skills since this is a family tradition passed down from generation to generation. Because of this, she now has an independent business as a milk producer. She owns 10 cows who she milks daily. The milk they produce is sold to a neighbor who has refrigerated tanks and to stores and cafes in town. This earns income to support her husband and pay family expenses.

Sandra is known for her drive, her perseverance, and her constant hard work. She has overcome obstacles from farming supplies and the unstable prices of the product she sells. However, she's been able to handle these difficult situations and move forward, motivated by her family's love.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy a cow for milking, which will replace one that is pregnant and doesn't produce as much milk. This will allow her to fulfill her contracts and improve her sales and income. This will allow her to keep working to strengthen her business. Sandra plans to grow her production capacity with more animals in the near future. Then she will be able to continue helping her family and bring them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a cow for milking.

loans.name: Sebastián

texts.es:
Sebastián es un joven emprendedor de 22 años de edad, que luego de culminar sus estudios secundarios no tuvo la oportunidad de realizar su carrera universitaria por cuestiones económicas; esto lo llevó a buscar oportunidades de empleo, pero por la falta de experiencia laboral y por no poseer estudios le ha sido difícil comenzar a trabajar. Con el ánimo de generar ingresos para apoyar a su familia con los gastos económicos del hogar, tomó la iniciativa de emprender su propio negocio de venta de mercancía; razón que lo impulsa a buscar el apoyo del crédito; el dinero será invertido en la compra de ropa, calzado y productos de aseo personal al por mayor, para comenzar a ofrecerlos para la venta y, aprovechar la ventaja de poseer un amplio círculo social en el que podrá vender sus productos y así dar inicio a su proyecto productivo.
Sebastián manifiesta que su propósito para un futuro a corto plazo es fortalecer su negocio, introduciendo nueva mercancía para ampliar su mercado y, a mediano plazo convertirse en un gran distribuidor de mercancía; lo que le generará una mayor rentabilidad y podrá ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sebastián is a young businessman of 22 whose lack of financial resources prevented him from attending university after graduating from high school. He therefore looked for a job, but had trouble finding one due to his lack of work experience and a college education. 

Sebastián took the initiative to to start his own business selling merchandise in order to earn an income and support his family and help it meet the household budget. Starting his own business prompted Sebastián to apply for a loan so that he can purchase wholesale clothing, footwear, and personal care products that he can then sell retail. Sebastián has a wide circle of friends to whom he can sell these goods and start a profitable business. 

Sebastián says that his short-term goal is to strengthen his business, introducing new merchandise in order to expand his market. In the medium-term, Sebastián hopes to become a large-scale distributor of goods, making his business more profitable so that he can offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothing, footwear, and personal care products.

loans.name: Ruiz

texts.es:
Ruiz Loaiza, tiene 27 años actualmente se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Administración de redes informáticas en la Universidad Sise, su carrera consta de 5 años y se encuentra en el primer año de su carrera. 
El trabaja en la misma universidad y recibe el apoyo de su Centro de Estudio para que pueda hacer sus horas académicas realizando sus prácticas pre-profesionales, el puesto que ocupa es de Control Administrativo; dedica 28 horas semanales para sus estudios y se siente muy entusiasmado de haber comenzado una nueva etapa en su vida y se impulsa cada día a aprender y a seguir adelante con sus metas y convertirse en un gran profesional.
Su meta a un futuro es poner su propia empresa de Base de datos y seguir con sus proyectos a largo plazo para poder sacar adelante a su familia.
Su anhelo más grande de Ruiz Loaiza es poder terminar su carrera satisfactoriamente y sacar su título universitario; el préstamo solicitado será utilizado para implementar su centro de estudios y así pueda desenvolverse mejor y de manera más práctica.
A la vez nos da su aporte de reconocimiento ya que se siente satisfecho y agradecido con las personas de otro País que aportan ayuda a las personas que más necesitan.
texts.en:
Ruiz Loaiza is 27 years old. He is currently studying toward a degree in Network Administration at Sise University. He is in the first year of this five-year degree program.

He also works at the university and receives the support of his department so that he can earn academic hours by doing his pre-professional internship. The post he holds is Auditor; he works 28 hours a week for his studies, and he feels very excited to have begun a new stage of his life. He pushes himself every day to learn, progress toward his goals, and become a great professional.

His goal for the future is to start his own database business and to continue with his long-term plan to provide for his family. His biggest dream is to be able to complete his degree satisfactorily and earn his university diploma. The loan he has requested will be used to equip his study area so that he can manage better and more efficiently.

He also expresses his appreciation, as he feels satisfied and grateful to the people from other countries who contribute their support to those who need it most.

loans.use: to buy materials for his studies.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan, desde que era muy joven aprendió de su padre a elaborar estructuras metálicas como puertas, ventanas, portones entre otros, su familia está integrada por su compañera de vida y dos hijos. Hasta la fecha no ha tenido ningún problema en realizar esta actividad, es el medio que utiliza para tener los recursos que necesita para salir adelante junto a su familia.
Juan comprara hierro y láminas por mayor ya que es la materia prima para continuar trabajando, espera cumplir con los trabajos pendientes que tiene de sus clientes, y aumentar sus ganancias con las que podrá cancelar su deuda.
Juan sueña con tener un negocio muy competitivo para tener los ingresos que necesita para dar a su familia una mejor alimentación.
texts.en:
Juan was very young when his father began to teach him to make metal objects, including doors, windows, and gates. Juan lives with his partner and their two children. Juan's metalworking business has been successful and provides the income he needs to provide for his family and make their lives better. 

Juan will use the loan funds to purchase wholesale iron and sheets, the raw material he needs to keep working. Juan expects to finish pending jobs for his customers and boost his income, allowing him to pay off a debt. 
 
Juan aspires to have a competitive business so that he can the income he needs to provide a better diet to his family.

loans.use: to purchase iron and sheets

loans.name: Cecilio

texts.es:
Cecilio, necesita invertir en la compra de concentrado para ganado, pues se está preparando para la época de verano y así tendrá el alimento necesario para mantener saludable y en óptimas condiciones el ganado.
El crédito anterior le permitió fortalecer el negocio, tener mejores ingresos con los que ha podido mejorar las condiciones familiares y adquirió un molino de nixtamal, con lo que tiene ingresos extras.
texts.en:
Cecilio needs to invest in the purchase of feed for cattle. He is preparing for summer, so he wants to have the necessary food to keep his cattle healthy and in good condition.

His previous loan allowed him to strengthen his business and improve his earnings, with which he was able to improve his family's living conditions and purchase a corn mill so that he can have extra income.

loans.use: to purchase feed for cattle.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen, es casada, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 10 años de edad, con el objetivo de dar una mejor alimentación, vestuario, educación y salud, a su familia, se dedica atender su negocio de granos básicos y ganadería, o hace junto a su familia, en un horario de 6:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m., su ventaja es que dispone de tierras propias para realizar estas actividades.
Invertirá en la compra de concentrado para ganado y la recolección de la cosecha, estará preparada para la época de verano, su cosecha será recolectada en menor tiempo. Espera fortalecer el negocio y aumentar sus ingresos con los que cancelara sus cuotas.
Sueña con continuar trabajando para dar a sus un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Carmen is married and has two children, ages 5 and 10. With the goal of providing better food, clothing, education, and health for her family, she tends to her business of selling staple grains and ranching. She sometimes works with her family. She works from 6:00 am until 3:00 pm. Her advantage is that she has her own land on which to perform these activities.

She will invest in the purchase of feed for cattle and collecting the harvest. She will be prepared for the summer season and her harvest will be collected in a short period of time. 

She hopes to strengthen her business and increase her income so that she can absolve her debts. She dreams of continuing to work to give her family a better future.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed and gather the harvest.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
María, se ha decidido por otro crédito para comprar dos cerdos y alimento para cerdos como para las aves de corral, tendrá un inventario más fortalecido que le permitirá aprovechar la época de fin de año.
El préstamo anterior le ha dado la oportunidad mejorar las condiciones en que vivía su familia, pues ha tenido buenos ingresos ya que su negocio es más competitivo.
texts.en:
María has decided to take another loan to purchase two pigs and feed for her pigs and barnyard birds. She will be able to have a stronger inventory that will allow her to take advantage of the end of the year.

Her previous loan gave her the opportunity to improve her family's living conditions since she had more income because her business was more competitive.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and feed.

loans.name: Ofelia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Ofelia, surtirá el inventario de su negocio de venta de pupusas y meriendas, comprara chicharrón, quesillo, aceite, carnes, embutidos, etc., con lo que contara con lo necesario y podrá continuar trabajando y teniendo más clientes satisfechos.
EL capital anterior le ayudo a surtir el negocio, tener más ingresos, cancelar sus deudas y cubrir los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Ofelia will stock the inventory of her business, where she sells pupusas and lunches. She will purchase pork rinds, cheese, oil, meat, sausages, etc., which will allow her to have the necessities to continue working and attracting more satisfied customers.

The previous loan helped her to stock her business, earn more income, pay her debts, and cover household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase pork rinds, cheese, oil, meat, sausages, etc.
